bahaLaSuTx maMtarxgaLa athaR\-gaLu gaMdhadhAraNe modalAda upacAragaLige saMbaMdhisuvudilalx. keVvala

\begin{entry}
\word{tirxvidha}
\src{va}
\meaning{\artha{mUru bage; mUru parxkAra:} \ullekha{vacana sAhitayxdalilx bahuvAgi baLasiruva I padakekx saMdaBARnusAravAgi aneVka bageya visheVSAthaR\-gaLu barutatxve. avugaLalilx kelavanunx ililx koDalAgide.}
\artha{guru, liMga, jaMgama:}
\ullekha{tanuva koTuTx guruvanolisabeVku manava koTuTx liMgavanolisabeVku dhanava koTuTx jaMgamavanolisabeVku I tirxvidhava horagu mADi ha{\re}ya hoyisi kuruha pUjisuva goravara mecacx (savasaM. 1; basava. 206-52).}
\artha{liMga, jaMgama, parxsAda:}
\ullekha{liMgadalilx kaThiNavuMTe jaMgamadalilx kulavuMTe parxsAdadalilx aruciyuMTe I tirxvidhadalilx BAvaBeVdavanarasuvene (savasaM. 1; basava. 286-70); liMga baMdu manavaniMbugoMbudu, jaMgama baMdu dhanavaniMbugoMbudu, parxsAda baMdu tanuvaniMbugoMbudu [I] tirxvidhavu tAne ...niVnolida sharaNaMge daqSaTx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 57-17).}
\artha{tanu, mana, dhana:}
\ullekha{tanuva koTuTx tanu bayalAyitutx manava koTuTx mana bayalAyitutx dhanava koTuTx dhana bayalAyitutx. I tirxvidhavanu koTuTx KUDala\-cenanxsaMgayayxnalilx basavaNaNxMge bayala samAdhiyAyitutx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1297-457).}
\artha{shudadhx, sidadhx, parxsidadhx parxsAda\-gaLu:}
\ullekha{shudadhxparxsAda guruvinadu, sidadhxparxsAda liMgadadu, parxsidadhxparxsAda jaMgamadadu, iMtiV tirxvidha oMdAdavara toV{\rA} (savasaM. 1; basava. 791-201).}
\artha{utapxtitx, sithxti, layagaLeMba mUru avasethx\-gaLu:}
\ullekha{mUjagadalilx ni[ra]taru KUDala\-saMgana sharaNaru tirxvidhava\-nari\-yaru (savasaM. 1; basava. 902-235).}
\artha{manaHsathxla, tanusathxla, karasathxla:}
\ullekha{hara tananx rUpa toVrabeVkeMdu, gururUpAgi baMdu manasathxlakekx maMtarxvAda tanusathxlakekx parxsAdavAda karasathxlakekx liMgavAda iMtiV tirxvidhadalilx sAhitayxvAdanayAyx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 22-10).}
\artha{tanushudadhx, manashudadhx, BAvashudadhx eMba mUru bageya shudadhxjiVvaru:}
\ullekha{tanushudadhxnAgi iSaTx\-liMgava pUjisabeVku manashudadhxnAgi pArxNaliMgava dhAyxnisabeVku BAvashudadhxnAgi BAvaliMgava BAvisabeVku iMtiV tirxvidhavana{\ri}yade... Anu shudadhxnAdeneMba kirxyAdevxYtiyAda pAtakana nAyakanaraka\-dalilxkukxva (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 939-298).}
\artha{kamaRkAMDa, BakitxkAMDa, jAcnxnakAMDa eMba mUru parxkAra\-gaLu:}
\ullekha{kamaRkAMDa BakitxkAMDa jAcnxnakAMDa I tirxvidhadalilx vaMcakanAdaDe Isu vidhadoLage aMgavilalx (savasaM. 1; basava. 889-232).}
\artha{honunx, \hbox{heNuNx}, maNuNxgaLeMba mUru bageya kAmane\-gaLu:}
\ullekha{neneva \hbox{manakekx} maNaNxne toVride. noVDuva kaNiNxge heNaNxne toVride, pUjisuva keYge honanxne toVride iMtiV tirxvidhavane toVrikoTuTx marahanikikxdeyayAyx (savasaM. 8; puranA. 8-4); a{\ri}vu bAhayxvAgi tirxvidhakekx kacAcxDaleVtakekx (savasaM. 7; GaTiTxvA. 427-147).}
\artha{acacxparxsAdi, nicacxparxsAdi, samayaparxsAdigaLeMba mUvaru parxsAdi\-gaLu.}
\artha{AdhAyxtimxka, AdhiBwtika, AdhideYvikaveMba mUru bageya kaSaTx\-gaLu.}
\artha{tAyxgAMga, BoVgAMga, yoVgAMga eMba aMgatarxya\-gaLu.}

\arthanonum{kirxyAniSapxtitx, BAvaniSapxtitx  matutx jAcnxnaniSapxtitxgaLeV tirxvidha \hbox{niSapxtitx}. iSaTxliMgapUje, parxsAda sivxVkaraNe, gurujaMgama Bakitx muMtAda  bAhayxkirxye\-gaLu niSapxtitxyAgabeVku. nAnu apiRsutitxdedxVne, nAneV  beVre, nananx apaRNe\-yanunx sivxVkarisuva parashivaneV beVre eMba  BAva niSapxtitxyAgabeVku. nijavAda liMgeYkayxnige tananx arivU  iruvudilalx. tAnu parashivanalilx oMdAgidedxVne eMba arivU  iruvudilalx:}
\ullekha{kirxyA\-niSapxtitx BAvaniSapxtitx jAcnxnaniSapxtitxyeMba tirxvidha guru\-gaLu (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 789-222).}}

\ullekha{varxtaBarxSaTx neVmakekx hAniyAdava. nitayxkaqtayxveMdu \hbox{hiDidu} biTaTxva. tirxvidhamalavanolelxneMdu toTaTxva iMtiV kaSaTxguNadalilx naDeva duSaTxgaLaLxra noVDA (savasaM. 8; bAbomamx. 251-103); A cenanxbasaveVshavxraM tirxvidhadiVkeSxgaLiMde tirxvidha liMgaMgaLaM tirxvidhAMgadoLf diVkeSxyaM mADi tirxvidhamalamaM biDade CeVdisalekx (cebapu. 59-18).} \artha{heNuNx, honunx matutx maNuNxgaLeMba mUru bageya kAmane\-gaLu:}
\ullekha{A heNaNx biTaTxDeVnu honinxnAse uLaLxnanxbara, alilxge hiriyatana sAladu. honanx biTaTxDeVnu maNiNxnAse uLaLxnanxbara, alilxge hiriyatana sAladu. ...I tirxvidha malava kaLedu suLiva nijasuLuhiMge namoV namoV eMbenayAyx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1781-664).}}

shivaliMgasavxrUpaM teV vakASxyXmi shaqNu pAvaRti |\\[1pt]

\meaning{\arthanonum{sUthxla, sUkaSxmX matutx kAraNa eMba tanutarxyagaLalilx anukarxmavAgi iSaTxliMga, pArxNaliMga matutx BAvaliMga\-gaLu nelegoLuLxvike (viV.pA.koV. 232):}
 \ullekha{aMgava biTuTx AtamxnuMTe? shakitxya biTuTx shivanuMTe? idu kAraNa sUthxla sUkaSxmX kAraNa - tanutarxyaviralu, iSaTx pArxNa BAvaveMba tirxvidhaliMgasaMbaMdha beVDaveMdaDe asaMKAyxta parxmathagaNaMgaLopupxvare? (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1642-600); idu kAraNa sUthxla sUkaSxmX kAraNatanutarxyaviralu iSaTxpArxNaBAvaveMba tirxvidha\-liMgasaMbaMdha beVDaveMdaDe asaMKAyxta parxmathagaNaMgaLopupxvare (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1642-600); kAyakekx iSaTxliMgaveMdeMbiri; manakekx pArxNaliMgaveMdeMbiri; AtamxMge taqpitxliMgaveMdeMbiri; I tirxvidhAMgadalilx tirxvidhaliMgasaMbaMdhavAyitetxMdeMbiri. mana BAvaMgaLalilx apiRtakirxVyalilx apiRtavilAlx eMbudu, adu aruhe? (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi. 229-111).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{liMgasayx saMbaMdhaH athavA liMgeVna saha saMbaMdhaH - liMgasaMbaMdhaH; tirxvidhashacx asw liMgasaMbaMdhashacx - tirxvidhaliMgasaMbaMdhaH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{tirxvidhaliMgasAnxna}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{kaTisAnxna, kaMThasAnxna matutx shiraH\-sAnxna eMba mUru bageya aBiSeVka:}
\ullekha{kaTisAnxna kaMThasAnxna maMDesAnxna modalAda tirxvidhaliMga sAnxnava mADi, pAvugoraDa meTiTx, pAvaDavAgali, paNARsanavAgali daBeR betatx modalAdA\-sanadalilx mUtaRva mADi gurupAdoVdakadoLage Basamx gaMdha puSapx maMtarxva sAthxpisi. paMcAmaqtaveMdu BAvisi anAdi niSakxlaMka joyxVtimaRya iSaTxmahAliMgadeVvaMge liVlAmajajxnava mADisi, karakamaladalilx anAdi niSakxlaMka joyxVtimaRya iSaTx\-mahAliMgadeVvana mUtaRva mADisikoMDu ...neVtarx modalAda liMgadavayavaMgaLa parxkASxLisi kaTisAnxna kaMThasAnxna maMDesAnxnava mADi (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 933-296).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{tirxvidhasayx liMgasayx sAnxnaM - tirxvidhaliMgasAnxnaM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{tirxvidhaliMgoVdaka}
\src{saM}
\meaning{\arthanonum{liMgoVdaka, pAdoVdaka, parxsAdoVdaka: guru-liMga-jaMgama\-gaLu liMgarUpiyAda parashivana rUpagaLeV AdadxriMda avugaLa pUjeyiMda pArxpatxvAguva pAdoVdaka\-gaLu:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
EkamUteRVsatxrXyoV BAgA guruliRMgaM ca jaMgamaH |\\[1pt]
tadeVvaMguNakaM gArxhayxM gurujaMgamayoVrapi ||\\[3pt]
\pauthor{(caM.A., kirx.pA., 4-15)}
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ni{tirxvidhasayx liMgasayx udakaM - tirxvidhaliMgoVdakaM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{tirxvidhaliVle}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{rudarxtavx, adu GaTisidalilx Ishavxratavx I eraDu kUDidalilx sadAshivatatatxvX, ivu mUru tirxvidhaliVle:}
\ullekha{parxthamadalilx rudarxtavx; adu GaTisidalilx Ishavxratavx. I eraDu kUDidalilx sadAshivatatatxvX. iMtiV tirxvidhaliVle EkAthaRvAdalilx parashivatatatxvXda parama\-parxkAsha (savasaM. 7; kalakeV. 41-18).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{tirxvidhA ca asw liVlA ca - tirxvidhaliVlA}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{tirxvidhaloVBi}
\src{va}

\newmeaning{\ni{loVBaH asitx asimxnf iti - loVBiV; tirxvidhashacx asw loVBiV ca - tirxvidhaloVBiV}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}

\begin{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{tirxvidhasathxLa}
\src{va}
\meaning{\artha{liMgasathxla, jaMgamasathxla matutx parxsAdasathxla eMba mUru sathxla:}
\ullekha{AcArada suKavanaMgadalilx nelegoLisi toVrida, anuBAvadanuva pArxNadalilx nelegoLisi toVrida, mahAjAcnxnada suKava savARMgadalilx nelegoLisi toVrida. iMtiV tirxvidhasathxlaniNaRyavanenage aruhida kAraNa KUDala\-saMgamadeVvayAyx (savasaM. 1; basava. 1034-278); hesarilalxda liMgakekx hesariDuva liMgadorxVhiya mAta keVLalAgadu. pUvaRdalilx nAmavilalxda guru, hesarilalxda liMga, hesarilalxda shiSayx I tirxvidhasathxlavanariyade keTaTxru guheVshavxrA (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 64-23); liMgasathxla, liMgasathxladalilxyeV niMdudu jaMgamasathxla, jaMgama\-sathxla\-dalilxyeV niMdudu parxsAdasathxla; parxsAdasathxladalilxyeV niMdudu I tirxvidhasathxla, tirxvidhadalilxyeV niMdudu ...nimamx sharaNaMge (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 661-197).} \artha{tirxvidha sathxLa:} \ullekha{liMgavenanxdavaMge liMgavuMTu, jaMgamavenanxdavaMge jaMgamavuMTu, parxsAdavenanxdavaMge parxsAdavuMTu, I tirxvidhasathxLavana\char'273\char'311yabalalxre KUDala\-cenanxsaMga tAneV uMTu (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 675-207).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{tirxvidhaM ca tatf sathxlaM ca - tirxvidhasathxlaM}}
\end{entry}
%Bakatxsathxla, maheVshasathxla, parxsAdisathxla, pArxNa liMgi sathxla, sharaNasathxla, matutx aikayxsathxla  ivugaLanunx kelavu vacanakAraru mUru guMpugaLAgi mADutAtxre. \begin{entry}
\word{dashavidhapAdoVdaka}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{gurupAdoVdaka, liMgapAdoVdaka, jaMgamapAdoVdaka, sapxshaRnoVdaka, avadhAnoVdaka, ApAyxyanoVdaka, hasotxVdaka, pariNAmoVdaka, ninARmoVdaka matutx satoyxVdaka eMba hatutx bageya pAdatiVthaR: tAtivxka\-daqSiTx matutx kirxyAdaqSiTx eMba eraDu riVtigaLalilx I dashavidhapAdoVdakagaLanunx viMgaDisabahudu. tAtivxka\-daqSiTxyalilx sapxshaRna guNadiMda baMdudu gurupAdoVdaka, aMgada guNavu nAsitxyAdalilx liMgapAdoVdaka, mahAgaNagaLa arivanunx paDedudu jaMgamapAdoVdaka, catudaRLapadamxvu vikasitavAgalu sapxshaRnoVdaka, liMgakekx parama pariNAmavanunx samapiRsidAga avadhAnoVdaka, liMgAroVgaNe mADidalilx ApAyxyanoVdakavu, liMgavanunx hasatxdalilxDalu hasotxVdaka, shivayoVgavuMTAdAga pariNAmoVdaka, nAmasiVmeyilalxvAdaMdu ninARmoVdaka hAgU shUnayxdalilx beretAga satoyxVdaka eMdAgutatxve. AcaraNeya daqSiTxyiMda, pAdagaLige saMbaMdhapaTuTxdu gurupAdoVdaka, A tiVthaRvanunx liMgasaMbaMdha mADuva iceCxyuMTAdalilx liMgoVdaka, majajxnakekx eredAga majajxnoVdaka athavA jaMgamapAdoVdaka, jihevxyalilx seVvisidAga sapxshaRnoVdaka, adanunx ecacxrikeyiMda seVvisidare avadhAnoVdaka, seVvaneya naMtara taqpitx hoMdidalilx ApAyxyanoVdaka, hasatxda tiVthaRvanunx salilxsidalilx hasotxVdaka, baTaTxla tiVthaRvanunx mUru bAri seVvisidare pariNAmoVdaka, aMthiMtha hesaranunx pAdoVdakakekx iDalu sAdhayxvilalxvAdudAgi ninARmoVdaka matutx barxhamxraMdharxdalilxruva cidamaqtaveMdeV BAvisuvudu satoyxVdaka eMdAguvuvu (viV.pA.koV. 243):}
\ullekha{parxthamadalilx pAdoVdaka, divxtiVyadalilx liMgoVdaka, taqtiVyadalilx majajxnoVdaka, catuthaRdalilx sapxshaRnoVdaka, paMcamadalilx avadhAnoVdaka, SaSaThxdalilx ApAyxyanoVdaka, sapatxmadalilx hasotxVdaka, aSaTxmadalilx pariNAmoVdaka, navamadalilx ninARmoVdaka, dashamadalilx satoyxVdaka iMtiV dashavidhapAdoVdakava tiLidukoLaLxbalalx kUDala\-cenanxsaMgA nimamx sharaNa (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1361-482); haLaLx hoLe keri bAvi maDu hoMDa cilume, koLa modalAda sAthxnakekx hoVgi parxthamadalilx ``shivashiva, harahara gurubasavaliMga'' eMba maMtarxdhAyxnadiMda pAdavaniTuTx caraNasoVMkiniM pavitarxvAdudakaveV dhULapAdoVdakavenisuvadayayx. AmeVle taMbigeyoLage shoVdhisi basavAkaSxrava liKisuvade gurupAdoVdakavenisuvadayayx; AmeVle acaRnAkirxyegaLa tiVciRsikoMDu nicacx\-parxsAdi saMbaMdhAcaraNeyaMte mugidalilx jaMgamapAdoVdakavenisuvadayayx; ...hasatxviTuTx sapxshaRnava mADe sapxshaRnoVdakavenisuvadayayx liMgakekx dhAreyiMda aBiSeVkava eredalilx avadhAroVdakavenisuvadayayx. liMgApiRtava mADabeVkeMba AnaMdave ApAyxyanoVdakaveMdenisuvadayayx. apiRtamuKadalilx hasatxva parxkASxlisi KaMDitava mADidalilxge hasotxVdakavenisuvadayayx. liMgakekx saMtaqpitx pariyaMtaravu apiRtava mADi[dalilx] pariNAmoVdakavenisuvadayayx. taTeTx baTaTxla leVhava mADidalilx ninARmoVdakavenisuvadayayx. leVhava mADida meVle darxvayxvanArisi savARMgadalilx leVpisuvade satoyxVdakavenisuvudayayx. iMtiV dashavidhapAdoVdakada vicArava tiLidu AmeVle nicacxparxsAdiya saMbaMdhAcaraNeyaMte parxsAdava mugivadayayx (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 71-21).}}
%\ullekha{dashavidhapAdoVdakavesagida[resa]ka eMteMdaDe... (savasaM. 1; basava. 1214-334); ayayx! muMde matayxRloVkada mahAgaNaM\-gaLu... dashavidhapAdoVdaka, EkAdashaparxsAda, SoVDashAvaraNa... (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 802-233); parxthamadalilx pAdoVdaka, divxtiVyadalilx liMgoVdaka... iMtiV dashavidhapAdoVdakava tiLidukoLabalalx... (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1361-482); ayAyx, sadAcAra sadaBxkitx satikxrXyA samayxkAjxcnXna sadavxtaRne... dashavidhapAdoVdaka EkAdashaparxsAda SoVDashaBakitxnivARha... (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 37-15); samarasa pAdoVdakadalilx liVyavAda sharaNaMge... dashavidhapAdoVdakavanariyadidaR pAdoVdaka tAneyAgi... (savasaM. 12; deVshikeVM. 922-274).}}

%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{dAsoVhavanunx Acarisalu eraDu niyamagaLanunx pAlisuvudu Avashayxka. modalaneyadu, satayx shudadhx kAyakadiMda saMpAdisidudaSaTxnenxV dAsoVhakekx upayoVgisabeVkeV horatu, uLida mAgaRgaLiMda saMpAdisidudananxlalx. hiMse, kwrxyaR, moVsa, muMtAda mAgaRgaLiMda saMpAdisidudu dAsoVhakekx ahaRvalalx. adeV riVti dAsoVhavu Bakatxna BaqtayxBAvavanunx parxtibiMbisabeVkeV horatu, avana DAMBikatana, vayxvahArika budidhx, ahaMkAravananxlalx.}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{dAsoVhavu pArxpaMcika vasutxgaLa meVlina namamx vAyxmoVhavanunx kaDime mADutatxde. alalxde, parashivaniMda paDedudanunx avanigeV dAsoVhada rUpadalilx hiMtirugisi, QuNamukatxBAvavanunx parxkaTisutetxVve.}}

\newmeaning{\ni{(upavAyu visheVSaH) - dhanaM jayati iti - dhanaMjayaH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{dhanaMjayavAyu}
\src{kA}
\meaning{\arthanonum{= dhanaMjaya} \ullekha{dhanaMjayavAyu niVlavaNaR barxhamxraMdharxsAthxnadalilxduR kaNaRdalilx samudarxGoVSavaM GoVSisi maraNakAlakekx niGoRVSamapupxdu (karaNa. 663-17); varadhanaMjayavAyu barxhamxraMdharxdoLipuRduru niVlavaNaRmadu kaNaRMgaLoLf biDade sharadhiniGoRVSaMgaLaM GoVSisute maraNadalilx niGoRVSamAgi irutipuRdu (cebapu. 58-27).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{dhanaMjayaH iti vAyuH - dhanaMjayavAyuH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{dhamaR}

\meaning{\artha{dhamaR, athaR, kAma, moVkaSxgaLeMba catuviRdha
puruSAthaRgaLalilx modalaneyadu. athaR matutx kAma\-gaLu dhamaRmAgaRdalilx naDedAga
moVkaSx.} \artha{jagatitxna sithxti, adara aBuyxdaya matutx nAyxyasamamxta vayxvahAra\-gaLu
yAvudanunx AsharxyisiruvudoV aMtaha oMdu guNa:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
``dhamaRH sherxVyaH samudidhxSaTxM sherxVyoV{\char'263}Buyxdaya sAdhanamf'' |\\
``dhamoRV vishavxsayx jagataH parxtiSAThx loVkeV dhamiRSaThxM parxjA upasapaRMti'' |
\end{shl}
\pauthor{(veYsheVSikasUtarx)}
\newmeaning{\artha{sadAcArasaMpananxrAda hiriyaru sari eMdu parxshaMse mADuva manuSayxna AcAra, naDavaLike:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}

sa dhamaRH yaM vigahaRMti tamadhamaRM parxcakaSxteV ||\\[1pt]
taseyxYva parakAyasayx samAcAroV ya iSayxteV |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sha.kw., BA-3, pu. 1445)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sadhamaRH... ||
\end{shl}
\pauthor{(si.shi., 16.58)}
\newmeaning{\artha{moVkaSxkekx sAdhanavAda anuSAThxna, kAyARcaraNe, shAsotxrXVkatx\-vAda
kamARnuSAThxna:}}

\begin{shl}

\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sha.kw. BA-3, pu.~1446)}
\newmeaning{\artha{manuSayxnu iha-para swKayxkAkxgi mADabeVkAda kAyaR, puNAyxcaraNe. AyA Asharxma matutx vaNaRgaLanunx udedxVshisi heVLuva dhamaR. udA : barxhamxcayARsharxmadhamaR, gaqhasAthxsharxmadhamaR, vAnaparxsathxdhamaR, saMnAyxsAsharxmadhamaR:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
AsharxmaM ca samAshirxtayx yoV dhamaRH saMparxvataRteV |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sha.kw., BA-3, parx. 1446)}
\newmeaning{\artha{BoVga, moVkaSxgaLa sididhxge kAraNavAda guNa. mahAtamxra, AcAravaMtara naDavaLike:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
dhamaR Eva samasAtxnAM yataH saMsididhxkAraNamf |\\[1pt]
AcAraM mahatAM daqSATxvX parxvataRMteV hi lwkikAH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 16.64-65)}
\newmeaning{\artha{satayx, kaSxme, daye, shwca, niyama, maqdutA, tapasusx,
tAyxga, barxhamxcayaR, saMtuSiTx, QujutA eMba hanonxMdu dhamaR\-gaLu:}}

satayxM kaSxmA dayA shwcaM niyamoV mAdaRvaM tathA |\\[1pt]
tapasAtxyXgoV barxhamxcayaRM saMtuSiTxshAcxjaRvaM tathA |\\[1pt]
dhamAR EkAdasha porxVkAtx BakAtxnAM shuBavAMCinAmf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(viV. sa. saM., 7. 11-12)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
dhamARnanxhi vidayxteV Kalu mameVtAyxloVcayx kAlAnatxraH | 3 : 2
\end{shl}
\medskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{`dhamaR' eMba padakekx vishAlavAda athaRvidudx avugaLalilx kelavanunx ililx paTiTx
mADabahudu.}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad suDuvudu beMkiya dhamaR, eMbalilx dhamaRkekx guNa athavA
 savxrUpa eMbathaRvide. yudadhx mADuvudu kaSxtirxya dhamaR eMbalilx dhamaRkekx
 kataRvayx eMbathaRvide. niVti eMbudu matotxMdu athaR.
dhamaRgarxMtha, bwdadhxdhamaR eMbalilx ``dhamaR''vu naMbike,
 AcAra matutx BAvanegaLanonxLagoLuLxtatxde. paramAtamx idAdxne athavA
ilalx, savxgaR naraka\-gaLive athavA ilalx, itAyxdi
 naMbike\-gaLu. bali koDuvudu, japisuvudu, pUje mADuvudu, dAna mADuvudu,
satayx, ahiMse, barxhamxcayaRgaLanunx pAlisuvudu, dhAyxna mADuvudu,
ivelalx AcAra\-gaLu. pUje, dhAyxna, japa itAyxdigaLa mUlaka taqpitx,
samAdhAna, AnaMda, shAMti muMtAdavu\-gaLu BAvane\-gaLu. obabx dhAmiRka
jiVvana naDesutAtxne, eMdare avanu mUru aMshagaLige otutx koDutAtxne, eMdathaR:}
\ullekha{Ashe iceCxgenanx gAsi mADadirayAyx, dAsoVhiyAgipaR dAsanAgirisenanx KUDala\-saMgamadeVvA, nimamx dhamaR (savasaM. 1; basava. 1056-284); sakala-niSakxla, rUpu-nirUpu mAyA-\-nimARya, kAraNa-akAraNa... dhamaR-adhamaRMgaLeMba kAla-\-veVLeyiMda niratanAgi (savaaM. 3; cenanxba. 1632-597); puNayxpApaMgaLanariyada munanx aneVka BavaMgaLalilx baMdu nimamx niluvanariyade keTaTxnayAyx. inunx nimamx sharaNuvokekxnAgi, nA nimamxneMdU agaladaMte mADA ayayx, nimamx dhamaR nimamx dhamaR! nimamxlilx oMdu beVDuve; enanx kamaRbaMdhana biDivaMte mADA (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 1268-364).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{daqcnf+manf - dharati loVkAnf (vishavxM) iti dhamaRH; dhirxyateV janeYH iti - dhamaRH}}

\begin{entry}

\begin{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{nirAkAra}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{shaMkarAcAyaRra adevxYtadalilx `nirAkAra' eMba visheVSaNa
 paramAtamxnige anavxyavAdAga, paramAtamxnige yAvudeV AkAra, yAvudeV

 padakekx beVre athaRvide. parashivanu shUnayxsithxtiyalilxdAdxga

saqSiTxyanunx mADidAga, athavA tAneV jagatAtxgi pariNamisidAga,
jagatetxV avana oMdu AkAravAgutatxde. Adare, jagatutx avana nitayx
AkAravalalx. EkeMdare shiva jagavAgalU balalx, jagavAgadiralU \hbox{balalx} (va.pa.koV. 217):}
\ullekha{sAkAra saMganalilx nirAkAravilelxMdu nirA\-kAra saMgavanarasi toLali baLalidenayAyx (savasaM. 1; basava. 1390-385); shirxVguru tananx sAkArava biTuTx nirAkAravAdaDe saMdeVhisalilalx. sAkAraviDidu upadeVshava koTuTx, enanx kAyava samapiRsikoMDu shudadhxna mADidanayAyx shirxVguru (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1616-588); dAyadalilx huTiTxda dhavxni A dAyadalilx hoVyitutx, A dAya nirAkAravAgi saMga saMyoVgavAyitatxyayx saMgayayx (savasaM. 5; niVlamamx. 965-294).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{nigaRtaH AkAraH yasayx saH - nirAkAraH; nigaRtaH AkAraH yasayx tatf - nirAkAraM}}
\end{entry}

muMDiV vA jaTiloV vApi daMDakASAyasaMyutaH |\\[1pt]
savxtaMterxV viVrasheYveV tu nirABAriV careVnamxhiVmf ||\\[1pt]

\ullekha{paqthivx IgaleV \hbox{Bakatx} apupx IgaleV maheVshavxra aginx IgaleV parxsAdi vAyu IgaleV pArxNaliMgi AkAsha IgaleV sharaNa I paMcatatatxvXda oLage beLaku katatxle aikayxvu (savasaM. 3; cananxba. 962-307); paqthivx apupx teVja vAyu AkAshaveMba paMcatatatxvXda madhayxdalilx pudidipapx Atamxna oDeyananarivAga paqthivx paqthivxya kUDitutx ...AkAsha AkAshava kUDitutx A paMcatatatxvXvu oMdaroLagoMdu kUDidalilx Atamxna pApa puNayxvAvudu (savasaM. 9; shAMtara. 27-11); paMcatatatxvXgaLa paMcakalashagaLa hUDi paMcAkaSxrimaMtarx kiviyoLage Udi (kUDasavx. 28-4); paMcatatatxvXyukatxvAda deVhavane Asharxyava mADikoMDu Atamxnu honunx heNuNx maNaNxne bayasutatx ...Bavakekx IDAgi keTaTxru kelabaru (liMgaliV. 314-17).}

\begin{entry}

\meaning{\arthanonum{(paMca mahApAtaka): shivaBakatxra bagege asaDeDx\-yanunx toVrisuvudu. avara kAyaRgaLige neravAgadiruvudu, ivaroMdige vAdisuvudu, avara dhamARcAragaLige salalxdiruvudu hAgU tAnu mADida shivaBakatxra seVveyanunx kuritu manasisxnalAlxdarU heVLikoLaLxdiruvudu - eMba aidu bageya pApakAyaR\-gaLu:} \ullekha{nimamx Bakatxra kaMDu udAsiVnava mADidare oMdaneya pAtaka. nimamx Bakatxra samayoVcitava naDesadidadxre eraDaneya pAtaka. nimamx BakatxroDane mArutatxrava koTaTxre mUraneya pAtaka. nimamx Bakatxra sakaLAthaRkekx salalxdidadxre nAlakxneya pAtaka. nimamx Bakatxrige mADideneMdu manadalilx hoLedare aidaneya pAtaka. iMtiV paMcapAtakava kaLeduLida kUDala\-cenanxsaMgA nimamx sharaNa (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 198-61).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{paMca ca tAni pAtakAni - paMcapAtakAni; paMcamahApAtakAni mahAMti ca tAni pAtakAni ca mahApAtakAni paMca ca tAni mahApAtakAni paMca mahApAtakAni - paMca mahApAtaka}}
\end{entry}

I athaRdalilx namamxlilxruva  paqthivx aMshavu adara adhideVvateyAda sadoyxVjAtana haMgu, adeV  riVti jalavu vAmadeVvana, aginxyu aGoVrana, vAyuvu tatupxruSana hAgU AkAshavu IshAnana haMgu. I deVha namamxdalalx, parashivanu namage koTiTxruva sAla eMbudu idara athaR. I sAlavanunx nAvu Bakitx matutx nisAvxthaR\-teya mUlaka tiVrisabeVku:}
\ullekha{paqthivx sadoyxVjAtana haMgu, jala vAmadeVvana haMgu, aginx aGoVrana haMgu, vAyu tatupxruSana haMgu, AkAsha IshAnana haMgu, paMcabarxhamxva maredu, OMkAra barxhamx\-vanari aiGaTa dUra rAmeVshavxraliMgava (savasaM. 8; meremiM. 1354-464).}}

\begin{entry}

\artha{guru, liMga, jaMgama, AcAra, parxsAdagaLige dorxVha mADuvaMtha aidu bageya pApakaqtayx\-gaLu:}
\ullekha{gurukAruNayxva haDeda Bakatxnu hiMdaNa pUvARsharxyava berasidaDe gurudorxVha liMgadorxVha jaMgamadorxVha AcAradorxVha parxsAdadorxVha iMtiV paMcamahApAtakaM\-gaLu BakatxMgalalxde Bavigelilxyado (savasaM. 1; basava. 768-195).}
\artha{aMgada meVle parxtiSAThxpisida liMgavanunx tegedu hAkuvudu, diVkeSx paDeyadavariMda AhAravanunx sivxVkarisuvudu, parxtimegaLanunx pUjisuvudu, parxsAdasaMbaMdhavanunx tiLiyadiruvudu, pArxNa\-vanunx liMgadalilx nelegoLisadiruvudu eMba aidu bageya hiVna kAyaR\-gaLu:}
\ullekha{aMgada meVle liMgaparxtiSeThxyane mADi hiMgidaDe parxthama pAtaka BavipAkakekxLasidaDeraDaneya pAtaka, parxtumAdigaLige{\ra}gidaDe mU{\ra}neya pAtaka, parxsAdasathxlavana{\ri}yadidadxDe nAlakxneya pAtaka, suLuhaDagi liMgaliVyava mADadidadxDe aidaneya pAtaka, iMtiV paMcamahApAtakava kaLeyabalalxDe tiLiyabeVku ...nimamx sharaNanAgabalalxDe (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 181-53).}
\artha{meVlakxMDa aidu bageya mahApApa\-kAyaRgaLanunx mADida vayxkitx:}
\ullekha{aMgada meVlaNa liMgava hiMgi sAthxvaraliMgakekxraguva BaMgitara muKava noVDalAgadu ...aMtapapx paMcamahApAtakara muKadatatx toVradirA (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 704-193); guruvinalilx upadeVsha paDedu parxsAdakekx sUtakava mADuva paMcamahApAtakaru niVvu keVLi BoV (savasaM. 8; maDimA. 574-216).}}
%\arthanonum{shivasharaNaru niSidadhxvAda aneVka bageya AcaraNegaLanunx paMcamahApAtakagaLeMdu ulelxVKisidAdxre. avugaLalilx kelavanunx meVle sUcisalAgide.}}
\newmeaning{\ni{mahAMti ca tAni pAtakAni ca mahApAtakAni paMca ca tAni mahApAtakAni ca - paMcamahApAtakAni}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}

\artha{shivapUjA\-kAladalilx pAlisabeVkAda Atamx, sAthxna, darxvayx, liMga matutx maMtarxshudidhxgaLeMba aidu bageya neYmaRlayx\-gaLu:}
\ullekha{Atamxshudidhx sAthxna\-shudidhx darxvayxshudidhx liMgashudidhx maMtarxshudidhxyeMba paMcashudidhxgaLaM visatxrisuvada{\ra}lilx shwcAcamana sAnxna Basamx rudArxkaSxdhAraNa kavaca maMtarx kalAnAyxsa dhAyxnAdi racanaMgeYvudeV Atamxshudidhxyenisuvudu samAmxjaRnAnuleVpana vaNaRka gaMdha puSapx dhUpa diVpAdi nimaRloVpakaraNaMgaLiM cwkamanalaMkaripudeV sAthxna\-shudidhxyenisuvudu jalagaMdhAkaSxte puSApxdigaLaM niriVkiSxsi Basamx maMtarxvArigaLiM saMporxVkaSxNaMgeYvudeV darxvayxshudidhxyenisuvudu anAmike madhayxmegaLa madhayxdalilx naviVnakusumaviDidu aMguSaThxtajaRnigaLiM modala nimARlayxmaM tayxjisi liMgapiVThamaM vAriyiM parxkASxlanaMgeYvudeV liMgashudidhxyenisuvudu sakalapUjAthaRmAgi OM namaH shivAya sAvxhA eMducacxripudeV maMtarxshudidhxyahudu (viveVka. 93).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{paMca ca tAH shudadhxyashacx - paMcashudadhxyaH}}

\ullekha{``liMgapiVTha\-gaLu samavAgi paMcasUtarx parxmANavu AgamoVkatxdaMte shudadhxvAdare AyureYshavxyaR\-gaLuMTAguvuvu... liMgavaM baLasida sUtarx parxmANaveV 1. liMgapiVThavaM aLeyuvudu, 2. liMgoVnanxta piVThaparxmANa, 3. goVmuKada agarxliMga masatxkaparxmANa, 4. adaradhaRveV goVmuKavu, 5. -hiVge paMcasUtarx\-gaLu shivAgamadathaRvu" (viVsheYpu. 7neya kAMDa, tAtapxyaRcaMdirxke. puTa 30); iMtu paMcasUtarxmuLaLx piVThaliMgadoLeMdeV jAtishilAdigaLAda kAMtimayavapapx liMga\-sathxlamaM tiVthARMbu paMcagavayx Basita mishorxVdakaMgaLiM paripUtamAda tirxvidha kuMBadoLf... avagAhamirisi (viveVka. 101); A paMcasUtarxda vidhAnaveMtene mahA shirxV paramaliMgamaM baLa\-sidaR sUtarxveV tA pavaNadoMdu sUtarxM liMgapiVThavaLeyalekxraDu liMgoVnanxtaM A piVThadeDeyoLeV mU{\ru} goVmuKadagarx Opa liMgada masatxkakekx nAlakxda{\ra}dhaRveV parikisalekx goVmuKaviMtu paMcasUtarxM shivAgamadathaRveY (viVsheYpu. 7-105-47). ``shivaliMgagaLa parxtiSAThxkAladalilx gamanisuva liMgoVcacxte, liMgavisAtxra, liMgaswthxlayx, piVThavisAtxra, parxnAlikAmAnagaLeMba aidu sUtarx\-gaLu" (kananxni. 5-5047)}; \artha{diVkASxvidhi \hbox{muMtAda} maMgaLakAyaRgaLigAgi sAthxpisuva paMcakalashagaLalilxya gurukalashakekx, maMtarxdhAyxnasahitavAgi uragabaMdhadaMte saMbaMdhi\-suva aidu eLe\-gaLu:} \ullekha{saMcadoVvariyoLage paMca\-sUtarxvu miMci kaMcumiMcina saMcalana nuMgitu paMca\-sUtarxvu miMci saMcadoVvarigoMDu paMcamuKa paramaguruvAda sharaNa (padagoV. {\rm v-}2); I maMtarxdiMda gurukalashakekx paMca\-sUtarxMgaLanikikx paMcapalalxvaMgaLanikikx paMcamuKaMgaLanikikx guru\-kalashavaM sAthxpayxvaM mADuvudu (gaNaBA. 189-21).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{paMca ca tAni sUtArxNi ca - paMcasUtArxNi}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{pAshupatAgama}}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{paramAtamx}
\meaning{\artha{jagatitxnalilx savaRvAyxpiyAgiruva \hbox{ceYtanayx}; parashiva:}
\ullekha{shudAdhxtamx paramAtamxribabxrU oMdu ratanxkekx heNagATava\-nADiharu. avara heNagATava noVDi A ratanxva seLedu koMDaDe kUDala\-saMgamadeVvaMgAroVgaNeyAyitutx (savasaM. 1; basava. 906-236); shirxV guru koTaTx liMgava biTuTx beVre matetx AtamxtatatxvXva vicArisi noVDabeVkeMdu paramAtamxnalilx yoVgava mADi yoVgigaLAgi mukatxrAdeveMbiri (savasaM. 6; uripe. 1279-404); ``AtamxneV barxhamx\-veMdu heVLuvaMtha veVdAMtiyu'' (basaTiV. {\rm\em{II}}, 254-907 TiVku); paramAtamx parameVshavxra ...nirUpa citetxYsu (basapu. 60-45).}
\artha{jiVvAtamx, aMtarAtamx matutx paramAtamx eMba AtamxtarxyagaLalilx oMdu; aMtArAtamxnigiMta ucacxsAthxnavanunx paDediruva paramAtamxnu kAraNashariVriyAgi, liMga\-sithxti\-yanunx paDedanaMtara shariVrada savARMgagaLalilxyU ceYtanayxvanunxMTumADutAtxne. kAraNashariVradoMdige saMbaMdhisida BAvaliMgavu parxkaTagoMDu Atamxnu shivanalilx suSupitxyalilx hoMdutAtxne:}
\ullekha{jiVvAtamx aMtarAtamx paramAtamxreMdAtamxtarxyaMgaLavaralilx ...loVkavayxvahArakekx sUyaRneMtaMte jiVvAMtarAtamxra vayxvahArasAkiSxkaneV paramAtamxnapapxM (viveVka. 25); AtamxM mU{\ru}BeVdaM ...jiVvAtamxnaMtarAtamxM baLika paramAtamxM ...tatapxrXpaMcadoLf barade silakxde nirAkArarUpinoLihaM paramAtamxM (cebapu. 58-31).}
\artha{EkoVtatxra jaMgamaliMgasathxladalilxruva olavuliMgada mUru sathxlagaLalilx oMdu; viveVkasavxrUpiyAda pArxNaliMgiyanunx paramAtamxnu Avarisuva sathxla:} \ullekha{olavu liMga\-tirxvidha: jiVvAtamx aMtarAtamx paramAtamx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 839-246).} 
\artha{Atamxna vikAsakakxnusAravAgi uMTAguva \hbox{jiVvAtamx}, aMtarAtamx, paramAtamx, nimaRlAtamx, shudAdhxtamx, \hbox{jAcnxnAtamx}, mahAtamx, divAyxtamx matutx cinamxyAtamx eMba oMbatutx avasethxgaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{vikAsa hoMdida hAge Atamxnu anukarxmavAgi \hbox{jiVvAtamx}, aMtarAtamx, paramAtamx ...divAyxtamx matutx cinamxyAtamx eMdu heVLalapxDutatxve (shivAkoV. 25-38).}
\artha{mUvatAtxru bageya tatatxvXgaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{CatitxVsa tatatxvXdoLu rAjisututxviRyoLagaNuvigaNuvA mahatitxge mahatitxVvaRrilelxnisuvadavxyarUpaniravanAM baNiNxsuvoDaLave ...enanx mana oMdipupxdipapxtatx A{\ro}VnisuvaMtarAtamxnoLalA ipapxtatx ELaneya paramAtamxnoLu nimamx manavipupxdayayx (viVsheYpu. 3-38-33).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{paramashacx asw AtAmx ca - paramAtAmx}}
\end{entry}
%Atamxna nijavanariyadu... paramAtamxna liMgavu tAneMdarida sharaNaMge... (savasaM. 1; basava. 1036-279); iSaTxliMgadalilx vishAvxsa balidare AyataliMga... Atana jiVva BAvavaLidu paramAtamxnenisidalilx... (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 944-284); jaladalilx huTiTxda kesaru kiSxVradalilx toLedare hoVhude?... jiVvAtAmx paramAtAmx ceVnumxkAtxnAM paramA gatiH... \begin{entry}
\word{parxNavada AkaqtigaLu}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{parxNavaveMdare, OM namaH shivAya eMba Aru akaSxrada
 maMtarxvAgidadxrU, A maMtarxvu shabadx athavA akaSxragaLiMda
 racitavAgidadxrU, kelavu vacanakAraru shAkatxranunx anukarisi A
 akaSxragaLige AkAragaLive eMdu heVLutAtxre. parxtha\-mAkaSxravu OM
 tAraka savxrUpa uLuLxdu, divxtiVyAkaSxravu daMDakAkaqti uLuLxdu,
 mUraneyadu kuMDalAkAravAgide, nAlakxneyadu adhaRcaMdArxkAravAgide,
 aidaneyadakekx dapaRNA\-kaqti ide matutx Araneyadakekx joyxVtiya
 AkAravide (va.pa.koV. 252):} \ullekha{inunx parxNavada lakaSxNavadeMteMdaDe: parxthama tAraka savxrUpavAgihudu. divxtiVya daMDasavxrUpavAgihudu. taqtiVya kuMDalAkAravAgihudu. catuthaR adhaRcaMdarxkAkAravAgihudu. paMcama dapaRNAkAravAgihudu. SaSaThx joyxVtisavxrUpavAgihudu noVDA. idakekx IshavxroVvAca: ``parxthamaM tArAkArUpaM| divxtiVya daMDa ucayxteV| taqtiVyaM kuMDalAkAraM| catuthaR cAdhaRcaMdarxkaM|| paMcamaM dapaRNAkAraM| SaSaThx joyxVtisavxrUpakaM| iti parxNava vijecnxVyaM| yadogxVpayxM varAnaneV||" iMteMdudAgi, aparxmANakUDalasaMgamadeVvA (savasaM. 13; bAlasaM. 501-252);
matatxM, A shiSayxnu ele sadugxrusAvxmi, aKaMDajoyxVtimaRyavAgiha paramoVMkAra utapxtayxvanu nimamx mahAvAkayxdiMda nirUpisi, nimamx sAvxnuBAvadaqkikxniMda toVralu kaMDu suKiyAdenu. inunx SaDivxdha BUtaMgaLutapxtayx nAyxsasathxlavanu nirUpiseMdu binenxYsalu, A sadugxrusAvxmi nirUpisidaradeMteMdaDe: aKaMDajoyxVtimaRyavAgiha paramoVMkAra parxNavada joyxVtisavxrUpadalilx AtamxnutapxtayxvAdanu. A parxNavada dapaRNAkAradalilx AkAsha utapxtayxvAyitutx. A parxNavada adhaRcaMdarxkadalilx vAyu utapxtayxvAyitutx. A parxNavada kuMDalAkAradalilx teVja utapxtayxvAyitutx. A parxNavada daMDakasavxrUpadalilx apupx utapxtayxvAyitutx. A parxNavada tArakasavxrUpadalilx paqthivx utapxtayxvAyitutx noVDA. idakekx citapxrXkAshAgameV: ``OMkAra joyxVtirUpeV ca| AtAmx ceYva samudaBxvaH| OMkAra dapaRNAkAreV| AkAshaM ca samudaBxvaM|| OMkAreV cAdhaRcaMderxV ca| vAyushecxYva samudaBxvaH| OMkAra kuMDalAkAreV| teVjashecxYva samudaBxvaM|| OMkAra daMDarUpeV ca| ApashecxYva samudaBxvaH| OMkAra tArakarUpeV| paqthivxshacx samudaBxvaH| iti SaSaThxBUtaM deVviV| sAthxna sAthxneV samudaBxma||" iMteMdudAgi, aparxmANakUDalasaMgamadeVvA (savasaM. 13; bAlasaM. 502-253); A aKaMDa joyxVtimaRya\-vAgiha paramoVMkAraparxNavada tArakAsavxrUpadalilx paqthivxyeMba mahA\-BUtavihudu. A parxNavada daMDasavxrUpadalilx apupxveMba mahABUtavihudu. A parxNavada kuMDalAkAradalilx teVjaveMba mahABUtavihudu. A parxNavada adhaRcaMdarxkadalilx vAyuveMba mahABUtavihudu. A parxNavada dapaRNAkAradalilx AkAshaveMba mahABUtavihudu. A parxNavada joyxVtisavxrUpadalilx AtamxneMba mahABUtavihudu noVDA. idakekx citipxMDAgameV: ``OMkAra tArakarUpeV| paqthivxBUtaM samAcareVtf| OMkAra daMDarUpeV ca| apupx BUta samAshirxtAH|| OMkAra kuMDalAkAreV| teVja\-BUtaH tathABaveVtf| OMkAra adhaRcaMderxV ca| vAyuBUtaM ca vataRteV|| OMkAra dapaRNAkAreV| voyxVmaBUtaM sadAshirxtAH| OMkAra joyxVtirUpeV ca| AtamxBUtAshirxtaM tathA| iti SaSaThxBUtaM deVviV| sAthxna sAthxneV samAcareVtf||" iMteMdudAgi. aparxmANakUDalasaMgamadeVvA (savasaM. 13; bAlasaM. 503-254); matatxM, A shiSayxnu ele sadugxrusAvxmi, SaDivxdhaBUtaMgaLutapxtayx nAyxsasathxlavanu nimamx mahAnuBAvavacanadiMda nirUpisi, nimamx mahAnuBAvadaqkikxniMda toVralu, kaMDu paramasuKiyAdenu. inunx BakatxmAheVshavxra parxsAdi pArxNaliMgi sharaNa aikayxrutapxtayx nAyxsa sathxlavanu nirUpiseMdu binenxYsalu, A sadugxrusAvxmi nirUpisidaradeMteMdaDe: aKaMDa joyxVtimaRyavAgiha paramoVMkAra parxNavada joyxVtisavxrUpadalilx aikayxnutapxtayxvAdanu. A parxNavada dapaRNAkAradalilx sharaNanutapxtayxvAdanu. A parxNavada adhaRcaMdarxkadalilx pArxNaliMgi utapxtayxvAdanu. A parxNavada kuMDalAkAradalilx parxsAdi utapxtayxvAdanu. A parxNavada daMDakasavxrUpadalilx maheVshavxra utapxtayxvAdanu. A parxNavada tArakasavxrUpadalilx BakatxnutapxtayxvAdanu noVDA. idakekx citapxrXkAshAgamoVtatxrasAreV: ``OMkAra joyxVtirUpeV ca| aikayxMtu samu\-daBxvaM| OMkAra dapaRNAkAreV| sharaNashacx samudaBxvaM|| OMkAreVcAdhaRcaMderxV ca| pArxNaliMgiV samudaBxvaM|| OMkAra kuMDalAkAreV| parxsAdiVshacx samudaBxvaM|| OMkAra daMDakarUpeV ca| mAheVshavxra samudaBxvaH| OMkAra tArakA\-rUpeV| BakatxshecxYva samudaBxvaH| iti SaDusathxlaM deVviV| sAthxnasAthxneVSu jAyateV|| iMteMdudAgi, aparxmANakUDalasaMgamadeVvA (\hbox{savasaM.} 13; bAlasaM. 504-254).}}
\end{entry}

\meaning{\arthanonum{iSaTxliMgAcaRka, pArxNaliMgAcaRka matutx BAvaliMgAcaRka eMba tirxvidhasharaNaralilx obabx; BeVdaBAvavilalxdiruvavanu:}
\ullekha{sharaNasathxla tirxvidha: iSaTxliMgAcaRka, pArxNaliMgAcaRka, taqpitxliMgAcaRka (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 720-215); A pArxNaliMgAcaRkanAda liMgAMgasaMbaMdhiyeV viVrasheYvaneMdarivudu (savasaM. 6; Adayayx. 993-301); savxyaMcaraparavana{\ri}yanAgi pArxNaliMgAcaRkanuM (viVsheYpu. 8-124-44); tAnu matutx tananx sutatxlina parisithxti ivugaLalilx yAva tarada BeVdabudidhxyuLaLxvaniruvadilAlxdadxriMda avanu pArxNaliMgAcaRkanu (shivAkoV. 42-67).}}

\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{pArxNaliMgAcaRna}
\meaning{\artha{iSaTxliMgada pUjAnaMtara manasisxnalilxyeV adara (iSaTxliMgada) dhAyxna mADuvudu:}}

\end{shl}

\pauthor{(sU.A., kirx.pA., 6. 47)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{aMtaraMgadalilxruva cidAkArarUpavAda shivarUpiliMgavanunx BAvapuSapxgaLiMda mADuva
pUje. A pUjA\-karxmavu hiVgide: aMtaraMgada pArxNavAyuviniMda vAyxpi\-siruva, atayxMta
sUkaSxmXvAda AkAshadiMda shoVBisuva shirasisxnalilxruva barxhamxraMdharxdalilxruva
caMdarxmaMDaladiMda sarxvisuva amaqtada dhAreyiMda shiVtalavAda shorxVtArxdi (kivi modalAda)
iMdirxyagaLa navadAvxragaLanunx baMdhisikoMDu shivajAcnxnaveMba diVpadalilx haqdayasAthxnadalilxruva
padamxpiVThadalilx nelesiruva dAvxdashadaLakaNiRkeyalilx suKAsiVnanAgiruva
maMgala\-mUtiRyAda cililxMgavanunx pArxNaliMgaveMdu BAvisikoMDu guruviniMda
upadiSaTxvAda karxmadalilx dhAyxnisutAtx, BAvavasutxgaLiMda pUjisuva parxkirxye.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad pArxNaliMgAcaRne mADuva BAvapuSapxgaLivu - kaSxmeyeV aBiSeVkada niVru, viveVkaveV
vasatxrX, satayxvanunx nuDiyuvudeV ABaraNa, veYrAgayxveV hUmAle, samAdhisithxtiyeV gaMdha,
nirahaMkAraveV akaSxte, sharxdedhxyeV dhUpa, jagatatxnunx beLaguva mahAjAcnxnaveV diVpa, BArxMtimUlavAda jagatatxnunx niveVdisuvudeV neYveVdayx, mwnaveV GaMTAnAda, shabadx-sapxshARdi
viSaya\-gaLanunx apiRsuvudeV tAMbUla, viSayaBArxMtirahitatatxvXveV parxdakiSxNe,
budidhxyanunx tAdAtamxyXgoLisuvudeV namasAkxra:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
aMtagaRtaM cidAkAraM liMgaM shivamayaM paramf |\\[2pt]
pUjayxMteV BAvapuSepxYyaRtf pArxNaliMgAcaRnaM hi tatf ||\\[2pt]
aMtaHpavanasaMsapxqqSeTxV susUkASxmXMbarashoVBiteV |\\[2pt]
mUdhaRnayxcaMdarxvigalatf sudhAseVkAtishiVtaleV ||\\[2pt]
badedhxVMdirxyanavadAvxreV boVdhadiVpeV haqdAlayeV |\\[2pt]
padamxpiVTheV samAsiVnaM cililxMgaM shivavigarxhamf ||
BAvayitAvx sadAkAlaM pUjayeVdABxvavasutxBiH |\\[2pt]
kaSxmABiSeVkasalilaM viveVkoV vasatxrXmucayxteV |
\end{shl}
\begin{shl}
satayxmABaraNaM porxVkatxM veYrAgayxM puSapxmAlikA ||\\[2pt]
gaMdhaH samAdhisaMpatitxrakaSxtA nirahaMkaqtiH |\\[2pt]
sharxdAdhx dhUpoV mahAjAcnxnaM jagadABxsiparxdiVpikA ||\\[2pt]
BArxMtimUlaparxpaMcasayx niveVdayxM taninxveVdanamf |\\[2pt]
mwnaM GaMTAparisapxMdasAtxMbUlaM viSayApaRNamf ||\\[2pt]
viSayaBArxMtirAhitayxM tatapxrXdakiSxNakalapxnA |\\[2pt]
budedhxVsatxdAtimxkA shakitxnaRmasAkxrakirxyA matA ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 12. 13-19; shi.ta.ra., 8-7. 81, 83)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{paramAnaMdada maThadoLage, pArxNaliMgAcaRneya mADuva mahAmahimara toVri badukisA, kUDala\-cenanxsaMgayAyx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1343-474); liMga saMgasayx mAterxVNa manaH pArxponxVti liMgatAM | liMgApaRNamidaM deVvi pArxNaliMgAcaRnaM sadA... (savasaM. 6; uripe. 1470-514).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{pArxNaliMgasayx acaRnaM - pArxNaliMgAcaRnaM}}
\end{entry}

(savasaM. 11; imamxDi. 1235-576); pArxNaliMgisathxla, pArxNaliMgAcaRnAsathxla shivayoVga samAdhisathxla, liMganijasathxla, aMgaliMgasathxla I aidu pArxNaliMgisathxlaM\-gaLu. \begin{entry}

\meaning{\artha{pArxNaliMgisathxlada aidu vidha

pArxNavAyuvu vAyxpisiruva, atayxMta sUkaSxmXvAda AkAshadiMda shoVBisuva
barxhamx\-raMdharxdalilxruva pUNaRcaMdarxmaMDaladiMda sarxvisuva amaqta\-dhAreyiMda shiVtalavAda
iMdirxyagaLa navadAvxragaLanunx baMdhisikoMDu haqdayasAthxnadalilxruva padamxpiVThadalilx
(dAvxdasha\-dala\-kamala\-piVTha\-dalilx) nelesiruva maMgaLamUtiRyAda cililxMgavanunx
pArxNaliMgaveMba BAvaneyiMda dhAyxnisutAtx, BAvavasutxgaLiMda mADuva pUjege
saMbaMdhisida sathxla:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}

pArxNaliMgisathxlaM cAdw pArxNaliMgAcaRnaM tataH ||

\smallskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 12.4)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{pArxNaliMgada susaMbaMdhadoLagaviraLa pArxNaviMtAgi rAjisu\-tipaR liMgasupArxNiya mahApArxNaliMga pUjAkarxmaMgaLAloVkanavadu meVNu kAyada karadoLu liMgakUTavu shivANatiya caluvamatigaLigadhigAratiyanUNeyaMbogadetatxlA pArxNaliMgAcaRnAsathxlaM (viVsheYpu. 8-125-48).} \artha{pArxNaliMgAcaRnasathxla:} \ullekha{pArxNaliMgasaMbaMdhavaMtanAda pArxNaliMgiya pArxNaliMgapUjAkarxmaveMtidiRtetxMdoDe muMde pArxNa\-liMgAcaRnesathxlavAdudu (keYvasha. 56-1 sUtarxM).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{pArxNaliMgAcaRnaM iti sathxlaM - pArxNaliMgAcaRnasathxlaM}}

%pArxNaliMgisathxla, pArxNaliMgAcaRnAsathxla... (savasaM. 14; SaNumxKa. 954-430);

\begin{entry}
\word{pArxNaliMgApaRNa}
\meaning{\arthanonum{parishudadhxvAda AcaraNegaLigAgi tananx manashushxdidhxyanunx mADikoLuLxva saluvAgi manasasxnunx pArxNaliMgakekx apiRsuvudu:}
\ullekha{iSaTxliMgApaRNavAdudu, pArxNaliMgA\-paRNavAdudu BAvaliMgApaRNavAduduyeMdare heVLiye keVLirayayx (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi. 532-243); ruci\-yAgi baMda padAthaRvanunx manada keYyalilx jihevxya muKadalilx pArxNaliMgakekx apiRsabeVku ...hiVge mADidalilx aMga mana BAva\-gaLu paramAtamxnalilx layavAguvavu. ivugaLige anukarxmavAgi iSaTxliMgApaRNa, pArxNaliMgApaRNa, BAvaliMgApaRNa eMba hesaru\-gaLuMTAgutatxve (shivAkoV. 76-143).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{pArxNaliMgasayx apaRNaM - pArxNaliMgApaRNaM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{pArxNaliMgi}
\meaning{\artha{Bakatxsathxla, mAheVshavxrasathxla,
parxsAdisathxlagaLalilx kamaRyoVgada pArxdhAnayxdiMda Bakatx, maheVsha, parxsAdi eMdu
kareyalAguva obabxneV sAdhakanu, pakavxvAda manasisxniMda jAcnxnayoVgasaMpananxnAdare avaneV
pArxNaliMgi eMdenisutAtxne. cidUrxpavAda shivaliMgaveV barxhamx. adara shakitxyeV
pArxNa\-rUpavu. averaDara (shiva-shakitxyara) savxrUpavanunx arita sAdhaka pArxNaliMgi:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
BakotxV mAheVshavxrashecxYSa parxsAdiVti ca kiVtiRtaH |\\
kamaRpArxdhAnayxyoVgeVna jAcnxnayoVgoV{\char'263}sayx kathayxteV ||\\
liMgaM cidAtamxkaM barxhamx tacaCxkitxH pArxNarUpiNiV |\\
tadUrxpaliMgavijAcnxniV pArxNaliMgiVti kathayxteV ||
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 12. 2-3)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{bAhayxvasutxgaLalilx (sAthxvaraliMga matutx adara pUjAparikaragaLalilx) parAknumxKanAgi
keVvala saMvililxMgada (jAcnxnarUpavAda pArxNaliMgada) parAmashiRyAgiruva yoVgi:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
saMvililxMgaparAmashiRV bAhayxvasutxparAknumxKaH |\\
yaH sadA vataRteV yoVgiV pArxNaliMgiV sa ucayxteV ||
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 12.10)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{sadavxsutx BAvarUpavAdudu pArxNamayiV shakitx, sadUrxpa\-vAdudu pArxNaliMga eMdu
tiLidu iveraDara sAmarasayxda anuBavavuLaLx sAdhaka:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
saMvililxMgaparAmashiRV bAhayxvasutxparAknumxKaH |\\
yaH sadA vataRteV yoVgiV pArxNaliMgiV sa ucayxteV ||\\
satAtx pArxNamayiV shakitxH sadUrxpaM pArxNaliMgakamf |\\
tatAsxmarasayx vijAcnxnAtf pArxNaliMgiVti kathayxteV ||
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 12. 10, 12)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{iSaTxliMga pArxNaliMga oMdeyeMda{\ri}du pArxNaliMgasavxrUpanAgi liMgasuKavananuBavisutatx eraDaLidu anuBAvaBakitxyiMda pArxNa\-liMgAcaRne mADutitxpupxdeV pArxNaliMgiyeMdu heVLalAyitutx (liMgaliV. 235-8).} \artha{pArxNagaLeV liMgaveMdu tiLidu, anusaMdhAnamADuva yoVgi:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
pArxNAH Eva hi liMgaM ceVtayxnusaMdhAnavAnf pumAnf ||\\[2pt]
sa Eva pArxNaliMgiVti porxVcayxteV sUkaSxmXdashiRBiH ||
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(kirx.sA., BA-3, pu.~112)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{Bakatx, mAheVshavxra, parxsAdi, pArxNaliMgi, sharaNaneYkayxnu melalx\-melalxne AdeheneMbananxbara nAnu vajarxdeVhiye ? (savasaM. 1; basava. 897-234); A sAvadhAnadoLagaNa sAvxnuBAvadiMda pArxNaliMgiyAgi A sAvxnuBAvadoLagaNa ariviniMda sharaNanAgi (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 1527-454); sapatx vayxsanagaLa biTuTx liMga vayxsaniyAgabalalxre kUDala\-cenanxsaMgayayxnalilx pArxNaliMgigaLeMbenu (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 330-107); pArxNaliMgiyAdAtanu parxLayakokxLagAganu (savasaM. 4; \hbox{sidadhxrA.} 792-224); manavu GanadoLagihudu pArxNaliMgige sahaja gati pApapuNayxrahitarf pArxNaliMgi\-gaLu sithxtiya liMgadoLuLaLxvarf pArxNaliMgi\-gaLu (diVkASxboV. 119-4).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{pArxNaH Eva liMgaM asayx iti - pArxNaliMgiV}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{pArxNaliMgiya pavanavaMga}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{haqdayasAthxnadalilxruva anAhatacakarxdalilx athavA
 adaralilxruva vAyutatatxvXdalilx (athavA Adishakitxyalilx) shivanu
 jaMgamaliMga rUpadalilxrutAtxne. jaMgamaliMgavanunx
 sAkASxtakxrisikoLuLxva sAdhakanige pArxNaliMgi eMba hesaridudx
 adanunx sAkASxtakxrisikoLaLxlu namamxlilx\-ruva vAyu (pavana) tatatxvXda
athavA Adishakitxya duSapxriNAmagaLanunx kaDime mADuva mUlaka adanunx
shudadhxmADabeVkAgutatxde; hiVge shudadhxvAda Adishakitxge anuBAva
Bakitx eMdu hesaru.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad pArxNaliMgiyeMdare Adishakitxya vividha rUpagaLAda hatutx
 vAyugaLanunx niyaMtirxsuvavanu eMdAdudariMda, A niyaMtarxNada mUlaka
 anuBAvavananx sAdhisikoLuLxtAtxne. I anuBAvada mUlaka sAdhakanu,
 pArxNavu heVge deVhada parxti kaNadalilxyU ideyoV hAge liMgavu
 (parashivanU) parxti kaNadalilxyU idAdxne eMba jAcnxnavanunx
 paDeyutAtxne. \hbox{pArxNaveV} liMga, liMgaveV pArxNa eMbudu keVvala
 naMbikeyalalx, adu avana savxMta anuBavakekx baMda satayx. aMdare
 avanu sididhxsikoMDa jaMgamaliMgakekx avana pArxNaveV (vAyuveV) aMga
 (va.pa.koV. 263):}
\ullekha{BakatxMge paqthivxyaMgavAgi, maheVshavxraMge apupxvaMgavAgi, parxsAdige aginxyaMgavAgi, pArxNaliMgige pavana\-saMgavAgi,... paMcatatatxvXkUDi oMdaralilx eyudxvalilx, SaDusathxla rUpAyitutx (savasaM. 8; moVLimA. 1972-638).}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{pArxNaliMgisathxla}
\meaning{\artha{SaTfsathxlagaLalilx nAlakxneya sathxla.
caraliMgada upAsaka rUpadiMda uMTAguva sathxla. pArxNa, iMdirxyAdigaLa viSayadalilx mamatavx
(nAnu, nananxdu eMba) budidhxyuMToV A moVhavanunx tayxjisi paMcapArxNasahitavAda
manasasxnunx liMgadalilx sAthxpisuvudanunx pArxNaliMgisathxlaveMdu kareyalAgide:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
Adw BakatxsathxlaM porxVkatxM tatoV mAheVshavxrasathxlamf |\\[2pt]
parxsAdisathxlamanayxtutx pArxNaliMgisathxlaM tataH ||
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 5. 24)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
tadupAsakarUpatAvxtf pArxNaliMgisathxlaM baBw |
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(a.sU., 3. 39)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
pArxNeVMdirxyAdiSu mamAhamiti parxmoVhamf |\\
saMBArxMtisidadhxmapahAyasamasatxmeVtatf |
\end{shl}
\begin{shl}
liMgeV nidhAya manasA yadanuparxyukatxM\\
tatf pArxNaliMgi sucarasathxlamAhurAyARH ||
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(a.sU., 4.30)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{vacanakArara parxkAra sharaNana AdhAyxtimxka munanxDeyalilx pArxNaliMgisathxla oMdu
 meYligalulx. iSaTxliMgapUje muMtAda vidhigaLanunx Acarisi, parashiva
horagidAdxne, eMdu modalu tiLididadx avanu, Iga dhAyxna japa,
maMtarxgaLanunx Acarisi, parashiva pArxNarUpadalilxdAdxne eMdu
tiLidukoMDidAdxne. modalinaMte Iga parashivanige horagina
padAthaRgaLanunx apiRsade, tananx kAyeVMdirxyAdigaLanenxV apiRsikoMDa
pArxNaliMgiyu tananxlelx iruva parashivananunx kANatoDagidAdxne.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{pArxNaliMgisathxlada aidu vidha aMgasathxlagaLalilx oMdu avAMtarasathxla. bAhayxliMga
(sAthxvaraliMga) vanunx matutx A \hbox{liMgada} pUjAsAmagirxgaLAda vasutxgaLanunx tayxjisi,
cidUrxpa pArxNaliMgada vicAradalilx maganxnAguva shivayoVgiyu pArxNaliMgi
eMdenisutAtxne. mAyAvikalapxdiMda janisida jagatutx heVyavAdudeMdu sadA
ciMtisutAtx sacicxdAnaMdarUpa liMga\-dalilx maganxnAguva yoVgiyu pArxNaliMgi. aMtaha
pArxNaliMgiya mahAtemxyanunx boVdhisuva sathxla:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
pArxNaliMgisathxlaM ceYtatf paMcasathxlasamanivxtamf |\\
pArxNaliMgisathxlaM cAdw... ||\\
saMvililxMgaparAmashiRV bAhayxvasutxparAknumxKaH |\\
yaH sadA vataRteV yoVgiV pArxNaliMgiV sa ucayxteV ||\\
mAyAvikalapxjaM vishavxM heVyaM saMciMtayx nitayxshaH |\\
cidAnaMdamayeV liMgeV viliVnaH pArxNaliMgavAnf ||
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 12. 4, 10-11)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{BeVda-aMgasathxlagata pArxNaliMgisathxladalilx pArxNaliMgisathxla, pArxNaliMgAcaRnasathxla, shivayoVgasamAdhisathxla, liMganijasathxla matutx aMgaliMgasathxla eMdu aidu avAMtara sathxlagaLive:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
pArxNaliMgisathxlaM ceYtatf paMcasathxlasamanivxtamf |\\
pArxNaliMgisathxlaM cAdw pArxNaliMgAcaRnaM tataH ||\\
shivayoVgasamAdhishacx tatoV liMganijasathxlamf |\\
aMgaliMgasathxlaM cAtha karxmAdeVSAM BidoVcayxteV ||
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 12. 4-5)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{liMgasathxlagata pArxNaliMgisathxladalilx Atamxsathxla, aMtarAtamx\-sathxla, paramAtamxsathxla, nideRVhAgamasathxla, niBARvAgama\-sathxla, naSATxgamasathxla, AdiparxsAdisathxla, aMtayxparxsAdisathxla, seVvayx\-parxsAdisathxla eMdu oMbatutx avAMtara sathxlagaLive:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sathxlAnAM navakaM porxVkatxM pArxNaliMgisathxlAshirxtamf |\\
AdAvAtamxsathxlaM porxVkatxM aMtarAtamxsathxlaM tataH ||\\
paramAtamxsathxlaM pashAcxtf nideRVhAgamasaMjacnxkamf |\\
niBARvAgamasaMjacnxM ca tatoV naSATxgamasathxlamf ||\\
AdiparxsAdanAmAtha tatoV{\char'263}payxMtayxparxsAdakamf |\\
seVvayxparxsAdakaM cAtha shurxNu teVSAM ca lakaSxNamf ||
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 18. 2-4)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{parxsAdisathxlakekx pArxNaliMgisathxlave parxti... sharaNasathxlakekx aikayxsathxlave parxti (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 842-248); Bakatx maheVsha parxsAdisathxlatarxyaMgaLa miVri pArxNaliMgisathxladalilx niMdeyalAlx, manave (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 1789-511); anilAMgadalilx manoVhasatxdiMda caraliMgAcaRna yukatxvAdudeV pArxNaliMgisathxla (shivAsU. 97); varasuparxsAdaliMgadinAdishakitxyuM berasi caraliMgavAyatxda{\ru}pAsakadoLaMdirade satApxrXNaliMgisathxlavadAyutx (cebapu. 61-26); iMtu parxsAdisathxladoLAcarisi parxsananx parxsAdadoLf sAmarasayxmaneyidxda parxsAdiyanuBavamuKadiMdanuSiThxsi sAmarasayxpArxpatxvaMtanAda BeVdaveMtidiRtetxMdoDe pArxNaliMgisathxlavAdudu (keYvasha. 55-1 sUtarxM).}}

\begin{entry}
  \word{pArxNaliMgisathxla tirxvidha}
  \src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{AdhAyxtimxka dAriyalilx parxgati sAdhisida Bakatxnu
 karasathxladalilx mAtarxvalalxde, deVhada elelxDeyalilxyU
 liMgasAthxpane mADabeVku. I BAvakekx pArxNaliMgisathxlavenunxtAtxre. idaralilx mUru upaBAgagaLidudx avugaLanunx
 anukarxma\-vAgi AcArapArxNi, liMgapArxNi matutx jaMgamapArxNi eMdu
 kareyalAgide. pArxNaliMgisathxlada modalaneV haMtadalilx Bakatxnu
 bAhayx AcAragaLige hecucx mahatavx koDutAtxne. sAnxna, liMgapUje,
 maMtarx, guru jaMgamagaLalilx \hbox{Bakitx}, parxsAda - pAdoVdaka seVvane,
 muMtAda bAhayx AcAra\-gaLu AdhAyxtimxka jiVvanakekx pArxraMBadalilx
 AvashayxkavAdarU aveV koneyalalx. Bakatx inUnx muMdakekx
 hoVgabeVkAdare, \hbox{shivanu} tananxlilxyeV idAdxneMdu tiLidu, dhAyxnada
 mUlaka shivananunx talupalu parxyatinxsabeVku. I parxyatanxvu
 avananunx liMgapArxNiyanAnxgi mADutatxde. dhAyxnada mUlaka avana
 matutx \hbox{shivana} \hbox{madheyx} dUra kaDimeyAdAga, (athavA avanu terehilalxda
Ganadalilx oMdA\-dAga) avanu tAneV liMgaveMdukoLuLxtAtxne. hiVge avanu
naDedADuva liMgavAdudariMda avanu jaMgama pArxNisathxladalilxdAdxneMdathaR:}
\ullekha{pArxNaliMgisathxlatirxvidha AcArapArxNi liMgapArxNi jaMgamapArxNi adakekx vivara manoVvAkAkxyadalilx AcArava avagarxhisihanAgi AcArapArxNi bAhoyxVpacAraMgaLa ma\char'273\char'311du liMgakekx tananx pArxNavane pUjeya mADuvanAgi liMgapArxNi bAhayxBakitxya ma\char'273\char'311du jaMgamakekx tananx tanu mana pArxNaMgaLa niveVdisuvanAgi jaMgamapArxNi (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 987-322).}}
\end{entry}

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad barxhAmxMDavanUnx piMDAMDavanUnx saqSiTxsuva barxhamxnu parxti

 gurukarasaMjAta eMdu kareyalAgide. diVkiSxta\-nAdavanu
 (AdhAyxtimxkavAgi) matotxMdu janamx paDediruvudariMda hAgU guruveV A

vayxkitxtavxvanunx saqSiTxsi barxhamxnAgutAtxnoV hAgeyeV A
hosa vayxkitxtavxvanunx kApADikoLuLxva mUlaka obabx viSuNxvU
AgabeVku. rudarxnu heVge koneyalilx elalxdanUnx saMhAra mADuva mUlaka

\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad namamx haLeya kamaRkakxnuguNavAgi Ishavxranu tananx tiroVdhAnashakitxya mUlaka namamxnunx heVge katatxleyalilxTuTx shivana

\meaning{\arthanonum{Basamxda tayArike. goVmayadiMda Basamxda tayArikeya vidhAna. idakekx BasamxsaMpAdana eMba nAmAMtaravU ide. maMtorxVcAcxraNeyiMda goVmayavanunx suTuTx Basamxvanunx tayArisuvudu, paMcAkaSxra maMtarx\-diMda modalige hasuvanunx aBimaMtirxsabeVku. aSoTxVtatxra\-shata (108) maMtarxdiMda aBimaMtirxsida hululx matutx niVranunx hasuvige koDabeVku. shukalxpakaSx athavA kaqSaNxpakaSxda catudaRshiyaMdu upavAsavidudx, pArxtaHkAladalilx edudx shuci\-BURtanAda sAdhakanu sithxracitatxnAgi sAnxnamADi, shuBarxvasatxrXgaLanunx dharisi \hbox{hAlanunx} kareyalu hasuvanunx sidadhxgoLisabeVku. hasuvanunx meVlebibxsi \hbox{gAyatirx} maMtarxdiMda goVmUtarxvanunx cinanx athavA beVrAvudeV loVhada pAterxyalilx saMgarxhisabeVku. goVmaya(sagaNi)yu BUmige biVLuva \hbox{munanxveV} saMgarxhisabeVku. eMTu sala mUla(paMcAkaSxriV) maMtarx\-vanunx japisi goVmUtarx matutx goVmayavanunx misharxNa mADi soVsabeVku. `BavAya namaH' eMba maMtarxdiMda goVmaya\-doMdige goVmUtarxvanunx misharxNamADi, `shavARya namaH' eMba maMtarxdiMda hadinAlukx uMDegaLanunx mADabeVku. A uMDegaLanunx bisilinalilx ELu sala paMcAkaSxramaMtarxdiMda oNagisabeVku. anaMtara aginxyanunx sidadhxpaDisi, parxNavasahita paMcAkaSxriyanunxcacxrisutatx A uMDegaLanunx aginxyalilx iDabeVku. vividha maMtarxgaLiMda elalx bageya AhutigaLanunx apiRsi `sadoyxVjAtaM parxpadAyxmi' itAyxdi maMtarx\-gaLiMda shivAginxyalilx suTuTx oNagida Basamxvanunx shoVdhisabeVku (soVsabeVku). iMtaha Basamxvanunx matetx goVmUtarxdoMdige misharxNamADi Basamxda gaTiTxgaLanunx tayArisabeVku:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
BasomxVtApxdanamudidxSaTxM catudhAR taMtarxveVdiBiH |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 7. 13)}
\pauthor{(caM: A., kirx. pA., 6. 6-22; pAra. A., 44-51; baq. jA. u., 5-31ralilx Basamx tayArikeya vidhAnavu visatxqqtavAgi nirUpitavAgide)}
\newmeaning{\ni{BasamxnaH utApxdanaM - BasomxVtApxdanaM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{BAkitxkavarxta}
\meaning{\arthanonum{gwrava, liMga, AcAra, parxsAda pAdoVdaka matutx BAkitxka eMba Aru bageya varxtagaLalilx oMdu; guruliMgajaMgamara parxsAdavanunx sivxVkarisi, sadAcAradiMdiruva varxta:}
\ullekha{guru\-liMga jaMgama pAdoVdaka parxsAdadalilx talilxVnavAda \hbox{BakitxyeV} BAkitxkavarxta (savasaM. 11; savxtaMtarx. 883-445); guru\-liMga jaMgama karxmapUjeyaM mADi varasheVSamaM koMDa\-kApaRNayxdiMda mutakxra nirAyAsa shwcaM dayamasapxqqhAdiyanasUyaveMba iravanaMgaMgoMDu tatitxrXvidha BakitxyAcaraNeyeV BAkitxkavarxtaM (viVsheYpu. 7-113-17).}}

\begin{entry}

\pauthor{(si. shi., 20. 1, 5, 35)}
\newmeaning{\ullekha{bAMDhasathxla, BAjanasathxla, aMgaleVpanasathxlaveMba tirxvidha jaMgamavu I oMbatutx mahAliMgadalilx saMbaMdhavu (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 789-222); savARMgakaraNaMgaLeMdenipa savARcAra sAdhanaMgaLanu gamamxneyiMbugoMDa BAMDasavxrUpavaneyidxdA liMgaveYkayxnamaLanenipa BoVjanamumAdaneY ...nimagakakx{\ri}M kUteRnanx manana miVsala BAjanavane mADideneMbudeV BAjanasathxla (viVsheYpu. 8-126-62); savaRkaraNaMgaLeMba savARcAradhanaMgaLaM vAyxpisi BAMDasavxrUpaM pArxpatx\-liMgavAyeYkayxMge tAne BAjanasavxrUpamaneyidxda BeVdaveMtidiRtetxMdoDe muMde BAjanasathxlavAdudu (keYvasha. 161-1 sUtarxM); hiMdina sathxlagaLa anuBavavanunx hoMdi savARcArasaMpatetxMbudu elalx darxvayxgaLige Asharxya sAthxnavAgalu adu BAMDasathxla. muMde idu aikayxnigU kUDa BAjanavAguvudu idu BAjanasathxla (shivAkoV. 66-108).}}

\begin{entry}
\word{BAva}
%\src{saM}
\meaning{\artha{tananx citatxdalilxruva elalx padAthaRgaLa anuBavarUpavAda ciMtaneyanunx shivanigapiRsuvudeV BAva. elalx jiVvigaLa baMdha-moVkaSxgaLige BAvaveV kAraNavAgirutatxde. shudadhxvAda BAvavu mukitxyanunxMTumADutatxde. \hbox{`shivoV{\char'263}haM'} eMba BAvaneyeV shudadhxBAva:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
citatxsathx sakalAthARnAM mananaM yatutx mAnaseV |\\
tadapaRNaM shiveV sAkASxtf mAnasoV BAva ucayxteV ||\\
BAva Eva hi jaMtUnAM kAraNaM baMdhamoVkaSxyoVH |\\
BAvashudwdhx BaveVnumxkitxH vipariVteV tu saMsaqtiH ||\\
BAvasayx shudidhxrAKAyxtA shivoV{\char'263}hamiti yoVjanA | 
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 17. 51-53)}
\newmeaning{\ullekha{sugaMdhadavanalalx duragxMdhadavanalalx noVDa! niravaya shUnayxliMga mUritx iMtu uBayavaLidu saMganabasavaNaNxna kara-mana-BAvaM\-gaLalilx beLaguva paraMjoyxVti tAne noVDa! (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 807-237); enanx mana BAvaMgaLoLagAda basava, enanxMtaraMga tuMbi niMdAta basava (savasaM. 5; nAgalAM. 797-255); aMga mana BAvaMgaLalilx herehiMgadAcarisuva paramAnaMda sharaNara nereyalilxdaR nararelalx pariBavaMgaLa siVguvarayAyx (savasaM. 12; deVshikeVM. 607-182); A parxpaMcuLaLx shakitxge tAne migilaleYyaparxpaMcina Bakitxyanunx keVLA liMgaveV parxkaSaRNadiSaTxvA pArxNa BAvaveMdiMtu mUde{\ra}nAdudu (viVsheYpu. 8-123-16).}
\artha{= BAvaliMga:} \ullekha{A parxpaMcuLaLx shakitxge tAne migilaleYyaparxpaMcina Bakitxyinunx keVLA liVgaveV parxkaSaRNadiSaTxvApArxNa BAvaveMdiMtu mUde\char'273nAdudu (viVsheYpu. 8-123-16).} \artha{BAva, niBARva matutx sadABxva eMba mUru parxkAragaLalilx oMdu; manasisxna vikaqti:}
\ullekha{BAva sadABxva niBARvaveMba BAvatarxyaMgaLalilx BaritanAgi ...saninxhitaBAvadiMdipupxdeV BAvaliMga (savasaM. 6; Adayayx. 766-236); BAva sadABxva niBARva eMba BAva\-tarxyaM\-gaLuLaLxvana deVvareMdenenx (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi. 23-10).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{BAvaH - BAvayati iti BAvaH}}
\end{entry}

\newmeaning{\artha{sAMKayxyoVga, tArakayoVga, amanasakxyoVga eMdu rAjayoVgavu mUru vidha. ipapxtetxYdu tatatxvXgaLa \hbox{jAcnxna} sAMKayxyoVga. manasusx, daqSiTx, pArxNavAyu\-gaLanunx bahimuRKavAgadaMte mudirxsuvudanunx ariyuvudu tArakayoVga. aMtaraMgada manasasxnunx neneyadaMte mudirxsuvudu amanasakxyoVga. ivu\-gaLu utatxroVtatxra sherxVSaThxvAdavu:}}

\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. yoV. parx., 1. 10-12)}

\medskip

\ullekha{(ru. jA. u., 27-42; caM. A., kirx. pA., 7. 25-39; si. shi; 7. 54-55; shi. ta. ra., 8. 6. 20-33)}}
\newmeaning{\artha{utatxma, madhayxma eMdu eraDu vidha. sahajavAgi raMdharxviruvaMtahadudx utatxma, puruSaparxyatanxdiMda raMdharxmADidaMtahadudx madhayxma:}}

\medskip
\pauthor{(ru. jA. u., 14-15; caM. A., kirx. pA., 7. 15)}
\newmeaning{\artha{AkAra BeVdadiMda utatxma, madhayxma, adhama eMdu mUru vidha. nelilxVkAyi gAtarxda rudArxkaSxvu utatxma, bAriVhaNiNxna gAtarxdudx madhayxma, kaDalekALu gAtarxdudx adhama enisive:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
dhAtirxVPalaparxmANaM yatf sherxVSaThxmeVtadudAhaqtamf |\\

utatxmaM caNamAtarxM sAyxtf parxkirxyeYSa mayoVcayxteV |

\smallskip
\pauthor{(ru. jA. u., 8-9; caM. A., kirx. pA., 7. 9-10)}
\newmeaning{\artha{bArxhamxNa, kaSxtirxya, veYshayx, shUdarx eMba rudArxkaSxvaqkaSxgaLiMda utapxtitxya AdhAradiMda rudArxkaSx\-gaLu nAlukx vidha. biLibaNaNxdudx bArxhamxNa, keMpu baNaNxdudx kaSxtirxya, haLadi baNaNxdudx veYshayx, kapupx baNaNxdudx shUdarx vaqkaSxgaLiMda janisive. bArxhamxNAdi\-gaLu karxmavAgi biLi, keMpu, haLadi, kapupx \hbox{baNaNxda} rudArxkaSxgaLanunx dharisabeVku:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}

vaqkASx jAtA paqthivAyxM tu tajAjxtiVyAH shuBAkaSxkAH ||\\
shevxVtAsutx bArxhamxNA jecnxVyAH kaSxtirxyA rakatxvaNaRkAH |\\

\medskip
\pauthor{(ru. jA. u., 10-12; caM. A., kirx. pA., 7. 11-13)}

\newmeaning{\artha{jaMgamaliMga, ajaMgamaliMga eMdu eraDu vidha. shivayoVgiyu jaMgamaliMga, maNuNx, mara, shilegaLiMda nimARNa\-vAdadudx ajaMgamaliMga (sAthxvaraliMga):}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
liMgaM ca divxvidhaM porxVkatxM jaMgamAjaMgamAtamxnA |\\

\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 9. 60-61)}
\newmeaning{\artha{iSaTxliMga, pArxNaliMga, BAvaliMga eMdu mUru vidha. ivu\-gaLu karxmavAgi sUthxlaliMga, sUkaSxmXliMga, parAtapxra liMga\-veMdu parxsidadhxvAgive. BAvaliMgakekx taqpitxliMga eMba matotxMdu hesarU ide. iSaTxliMgavu sakala, pArxNaliMgavu sakalaniSakxla, BAvaliMgavu niSakxla eMdenisive. iSaTxliMgavu kaNiNxna kaleyiMda gArxhayx, pArxNaliMgavu manoVgArxhayx, BAvaliMgavu BAvagArxhayxvAdudu:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
mahAliMgaM tirxdhA jAtaM sujanAnujiGaqkaSxyA |\\
parxthamaM BAvaliMgaM tu divxtiVyaM pArxNaliMgakamf ||\\

pArxNaliMgaM manoVgArxhayxM BaveVtf sakalaniSakxlamf ||\\

\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx, pA., 3. 23-25)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}

iSaTxliMgamidaM sUthxlaM yadf bAheyxV dhAyaRteV tanw ||\\
pArxNaliMgamidaM sUkaSxmXM yadaMtaBARvanAmayamf |\\

\medskip
\pauthor{(si. shi., 6. 49-50)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
aKaMDameVkaM liMgaM sAyxtf tadeVva guruNA paramf |\\

\medskip
\pauthor{(liM. dhA. caM., pu. 73)}
\newmeaning{\artha{parabiMdu, paranAda, aparabiMdu, aparanAda eMdu nAlukx vidha. ivugaLa viBAgavu liMgada meVlina matutx keLagina BAgagaLanunx Adhariside. elalxdakikxMta keLagina BAga aparabiMdu, adara meVle aparanAda, adakUkx meVle parabiMdu matutx elalxkUkx meVle paranAda:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
tadeVva shivaliMgaM hi talilxMgaM tu catuviRdhamf |\\

\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 3. 10-11)}
\newmeaning{\artha{BUmiya vikArasavxrUpadiMda sAvxyaMBuvaliMga, biMdu\-liMga, parxtiSiThxtaliMga, caraliMga, guruliMga eMdu aidu vidha. tAnAgiyeV udaBxvavAdaliMga sAvxyaMBuva, biMdu-nAdagaLiMda kUDidudu biMduliMga, mahAtamxru matutx shAsatxrXjacnx\-riMda maMtorxVcAcxradiMda sAthxpisidudx parxtiSiThxtaliMga, soMTa modalAda shariVrada nAnA BAgagaLalilx dharisuva nAnA ratanx, loVha, shile, maNuNx modalAdavugaLiMda nimARNavAda liMga caraliMga, vishavxsatxru matutx shiSayxrugaLige gurushariVraveV guruliMga:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
BUvikArANi liMgAni jAcnxtAmi parxbarxviVmi vaH |\\
savxyaMBuliMgaM parxthamaM biMduliMgaM divxtiVyakamf ||\\
parxtiSiThxtaM caraM ceYva guruliMgaM ca paMcakamf |\\
savxyaMBUtaM jAtamiti savxyaMBUriti taM viduH ||\\
biMdunAdamayaM liMgaM sAthxvaraM jaMgamaM ca yatf ||\\
mahadiBxshecxYva shAsatxrXjecnxYH rAjaBishacx mahAdhaneYH |\\
shilepxVna kalipxtaM liMgaM maMterxVNa sAthxpitaH ca yatf ||\\
parxtiSiThxtaM pArxkaqtaM hi pArxkaqteYshavxyaR BoVgadamf |\\
kaTAyxdiSu tirxkoVNeVSu liMgamAdhAyxtimxkaM caramf ||\\
parxthamaM caraliMgeVSu rasaliMgaM parxkathayxteV |\\
shilAliMgaM bArxhamxNAnAM savaRkAmaPalaparxdamf ||\\
ratanxliMgaM kaSxtirxyANAM mahArAjayxparxdaM shuBamf |\\
savxNaRliMgaM tu veYshAyxnAM mahAdhanavatAM parxdamf ||\\
maqlilxMgaM ca tu shUdArxNAM mahadeYshavxyaRdaM viduH |\\
sAPxTikaM bANaliMgaM ca saveRVSAM savaRkAmadamf ||\\
vishavxsAthxnAM tu shiSAyxNAM gururitayxBidhiVyateV |\\
tasAmxdugxrushariVraM tu guruliMgaM BaveVdf budhAH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-1, 3. 346-401)}
\newmeaning{\artha{iSaTxliMgavu guruliMga, AcAraliMgaveMdu, pArxNaliMgavu caraliMga, shivaliMgaveMdu, BAvaliMgavu parxsAdaliMga, mahAliMgaveMdu-oTuTx Aru vidha. ivu\-gaLu SaTfsathxlagaLige saMbaMdhisive. AcAraliMgavu Bakatxsathxla, guru\-liMgavu mAheVshavxrasathxla, shivaliMgavu parxsAdisathxla, caraliMgavu pArxNa\-liMgisathxla, parxsAdaliMgavu sharaNasathxla matutx mahAliMgavu aikayxsathxlagaLige saMbaMdhisive:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}

BAvaliMgaM mahAliMgaparxsAdABiKayxkaM davxyamf ||\\
pArxNaliMgaM tathA carashivaliMgadavxyaM BaveVtf |\\

\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 3. 26-27)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}

aMgaM ca caraliMgeVna saMyukatxM pArxNaliMgi yatf ||\\

\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a. sU., 5. 72-82)}
\newmeaning{\artha{AcAraliMga modalAda Aru liMga\-gaLu matetx talA mUru mUru vidhavAgutatxve. AcAraliMgavu sadAcAraliMga, niyatAcAraliMga, gaNAcAraliMga; guruliMgavu diVkASxguruliMga, shikASxguruliMga, anuBAvaguruliMga; shivaliMgavu iSaTxliMga, pArxNaliMga, BAvaliMga; caraliMgavu savxyaliMga, caraliMga, paraliMga; parxsAdaliMgavu shudadhxparxsAdaliMga, sidadhxparxsAdaliMga, parxsidadhxparxsAdaliMga; mahAliMgavu piMDajaliMga, aMDajaliMga, biMdAvxkAshaliMgaveMdu oTuTx hadineMTu liMgagaLAgutatxve:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sathxlamAcAraliMgasayx tirxvidhaM shUrxyatAM karxmAtf |\\

iSaTxliMgaM pArxNaliMgaM BAvaliMgamiti tirxdhA ||\\

savxyaM caraM paraM ceVti terxYvidhayxM samupAgatamf ||\\
parxsAdaliMgaterxYvidhayxmapi shurxNu varAnaneV |\\
shudadhxM sidadhxM parxsidadhxM ca BeVdashecxYSAmathoVcayxteV ||\\
mahAliMgasathxlaM cApi tirxdhA BinanxM shurxNu karxmAtf |\\
piMDajaM parxthamaM porxVkatxmaMDajaM ca tataH paramf ||\\
biMdAvxkAshaM tatoV jecnxVyameVSAM lakaSxNamucayxteV ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 8-26)}
\newmeaning{\artha{sithxra, cara, sithxracara, carasithxra, sithxrasithxra, caracara eMdu liMgavu Aru vidha (lakaSxNagaLanunx Adharisida BeVda):}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}

sithxrasithxraM caracaraM SaDivxdhaM liMgalakaSxNamf ||

\medskip
\pauthor{(pAra. A., 16. 9)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{AyA pada\-gaLu}}}
\newmeaning{\artha{utatxma, madhayxma, adhama eMdu liMgavu mUru vidha. ivu talA matetx mUru mUru vidhavAgi oTuTx oMbatutx vidhavAgutatxve. ELu-eMTu-oMbatutx aMgulagaLa liMgavu utatxma; nAlukx-aidu-Aru aMgulagaLa liMgavu \hbox{madhayxma}; oMdu-eraDu-mUru aMgulagaLa liMgavu \hbox{adhama} enisutatxve. niVrina meVlina guLeLxya AkAradudx utatxma\-liMga; koVLimoTeTxya AkAradudx madhayxma; hasuvina hega\-lina AkAradudx madhayxmaliMga (AkArada AdhAradiMda uMTAda BeVda). oMdu, eraDu, mUru, nAlukx, aidu, Aru, ELu, eMTu, oMbatutx aMgula gAtarxda oMbatutx liMga\-gaLu:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}

ESevxVkeVna tirxdhA tadavxdukatxmaMgulamAnataH ||\\
navASaTxsapAtxMgulakaM liMgaM sherxVSaThx tathA samxqqtamf |\\
SaDfpaMcakacatumARnaM madhayxmaM tirxvidhaM samxqqtamf ||\\
tirxdevxyXVkAMgulamAniVyaM tirxvidhaM tasayx saMsakxqqtamf |\\
EvaM navavidhaM porxVkatxM yathA karxmAtf ||\\
utatxmaM budubxdhAkAraM madhayxmaM kukukxTAMDavatf |\\
adhamaM goVkakutf parxKayxmiti liMgaM tirxdhA samxqqtamf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sheY. ra., BA-2, 4. 52-55)}
\newmeaning{\artha{aKaMDaliMga, BAvaliMga, pArxNaliMga, iSaTxliMga, paqthivxVrUpada AcAraliMga, jalarUpada guruliMga, teVjoVrUpada shivaliMga, vAyurUpada caraliMga, AkAshamayavAda parxsAdaliMga, AtamxtatatxvXrUpada mahAliMga-eMdu hatutx vidha liMga\-gaLu:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
iSaTxliMgaparxkaqtikaM AcAraguruliMgakeV |\\
pAthiRvApeyxV iti porxVketxV sheYvAgamavishAradeYH ||\\
pArxNaliMgaparxkaqtikeV teVjoVvAyumayeV tathA |\\
shivaliMgacarABiKeyxV liMgeV devxV varavaNiRni ||\\
voyxVmaparxkaqtikaM liMgaM pArxsAdAKayxM mahatatxramf |\\
AtamxtatatxvXmayaM porxVkatxM mahAliMgaM mahatatxramf ||\\
iti sidAdhxMtasheVKaravacaneVnoVkAtxnAM dashavidhaliMgAnAmf...
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(liM. dhA. caM., pu. 73)}
\newmeaning{\artha{BAvaliMga, pArxNaliMga, iSaTxliMga eMdu liMgasathxlavu mUru vidha. I mUru liMga\-gaLu matetx talA eraDeraDAgutatxve. BAvaliMgavu mahAliMga, parxsAdaliMga eMdU, pArxNaliMgavu caraliMga, shivaliMga eMdU, iSaTxliMgavu guruliMga, AcAraliMgaveMdU talA eraDeraDAgi oTuTx Aru liMgasathxlagaLAgutatxve:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
liMgasathxlaM tirxdhA jecnxVyaM tadeBxVdoV vaNayxRteV karxmAtf ||\\
parxthamaM BAvaliMgaM sAyxdf divxtiVyaM pArxNaliMgakamf |\\
taqtiVyamiSaTxliMgaM sAyxditeyxVtatf tirxvidhaM samxqqtamf ||\\
EkameVkaM sathxlaM BUyoV divxvidhaM divxvidhaM BaveVtf ||\\
mahAliMgaM parxsAdAKayxM liMgamituyxBayasathxlamf |\\
BAvaliMgaM BavateyxVva sAvxnuBUtiparxmANataH ||\\
tathA ca caraliMgaM ca shivaliMgamiti davxyamf |\\
pArxNaliMgaM BavateyxVva tAtapxyARthoRV na saMshayaH ||\\
guruliMgaM tathA{\char'263\char'263}cAraliMgamituyxBayasathxlamf |\\
iSaTxliMgaM BavateyxVva satayxmukatxmidaM mayA ||\\

\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a. sU., 3. 16-21)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
BAvAdiliMgatirxtayaM divxvidhaM divxvidhaM BaveVtf |\\
BAvaliMgaM mahAliMgaparxsAdABiKayxkaM davxyamf ||\\
pArxNaliMgaM tathA carashivaliMgadavxyaM BaveVtf |\\
iSaTxM tu guruliMgAKayxmAcArAKayxM davxyaM BaveVtf |

\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 3. 26-27)}
\newmeaning{\artha{liMgAMgasAmarasayxdalilx aneVka parxBeVdagaLive. muKayxvAgi sAdhanasahita matutx sAdhanarahita eMdu eraDu vidha. veVdhA, manu (maMtarx), kirxyA eMba mUru diVkeSxgaLiMda uMTAguva sAdhanegaLiMda sAdhisuvaMtahadudx sAdhanasahita liMgAMgasAmarasayx. shirxVguruvina upadeVshavanunx pAlisuvudariMda uMTAguvudu sAdhanarahita liMgAMgasAmarasayx enisive:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}

daharoVpAsanAdhAyxyeV saMvagoRVpAsanAdayaH |\\
sahitAH sAdhaneVneYteV rahitAH sAdhaneYsatxtaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-3, 19. 9-10)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}

tadapi divxvidhaM porxVkatxM sAdhaneVna samanivxtamf |\\
divxtiVyaM tadivxnimuRkatxmAdayxM gurukaqtaM parA ||\\
divxtiVyamapi shiSayxsayx guruvAkayxsayx pAlanAtf |\\
AdayxM veVdhAdidiVkASxBAyxsitxrXpuMDarxsAyxpi dhAraNAtf ||

\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-3, 19. 2-4)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{nitayxliMgAcaRne, kAmayxliMgAcaRne eMdu liMgAcaRneyu eraDu vidha. iSATxthaRvanunx pUreYsuvudu kAmayxliMgAcaRne, pApanAshakavAdadudx nitayxliMgAcaRne:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}

tatheYva haradatAtxyeRYrukatxM tAtapxyaRsaMgarxheV ||\\
devxVdhA tavAcaRnavidhisatxruNeVMdumwleV |\\
kAmAyakashicxdaparoV duritakaSxyAya |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(paM. ca., 1. 5-6)}
\newmeaning{\artha{iSaTxliMgapUjeyu mahatiV, guviRV, laGivxV, avasarA eMdu nAlukx vidha. mahatiV pUjeyanunx utatxmanu (SaTfkAlagaLalilx pUjemADuvavanu), guviRVpUjeyanunx madhayxmanu (tirxkAla pUjemADuvavanu), ashakatxnu pArxtaHkAla \hbox{muMtAda} samayadalilx BoVjana samayadalilx avasarA pUje\-yanunx mADabeVku:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
utatxmoV mahatiVM kuyARdf guviRVM madhayxma Eva ca |\\
laGivxVmashakatxH kuyARcacx sAyaM mAdhAyxhanxkeV tathA ||\\
avasarA BoVjaneV porxVkAtx pArxtarAdiSu suvarxteV |\\
tirxkAlamacaRnAM kuyARcaCxkatxH SaTfkAlameVva vA ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kA. A., kirx. pA., 4. 5-6; makuTa., kirx. pA., 3. 3-4)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{mahatiVpUjA, guviRVpUjA, laGivxVpUjA, avasarApUjA}}}
\newmeaning{\artha{pArxNa, apAna, vAyxna, udAna, samAna eMdu parxdhAnavAgi aidu BeVda. raMBa eMbudu Araneyadu. ivu karxmavAgi AcAraliMga, guruliMga, shivaliMga, caraliMga, parxsAdaliMga, mahAliMgada rUpa\-gaLu. nAga, kUmaR, kaqkara, deVva\-datatx, dhanaMjaya, satxMBa eMdu Aru upavAyu\-gaLu. I upavAyu\-gaLu karxmavAgi Bakatx, mAheVshavxra, parxsAdi, pArxNaliMgi, sharaNa, aikayx eMba SaTfsathxlarUpa\-gaLu:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
vAyavaH-pArxNaH apAnaH vAyxnaH udAnaH samAnaH raMBaH iti nAmAnx vataRmAnAH AcAraliMga guruliMga shivaliMga jaMgamaliMga parxsAdaliMga mahAliMgarUpAH |...\\
upavAyavaH-nAgaH kUmaRH kaqkaraH deVvadatatxH dhanaMjayaH satxMBaH iti nAmAnx vataRmAnAH BakatxmAheVshavxraparxsAdi pArxNaliMgi sharaNeYkayxrUpAH... |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shurx. sA., 16, pu. 8)}
\newmeaning{\artha{sAmAnayx, visheVSa, nirABAriV eMdu viVrasheYvavu mUru vidha:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
punaH tirxvidhameVtadidhx sAmAnAyxdiBeVdataH |\\
sAmAnayxshacx visheVSashacx nirABAriVti ca tirxdhA ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 10. 35; sU. A., kirx. pA., 7. 30)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{sAmAnayxviVrasheYva, visheVSa viVrasheYva, nirABAriV viVrasheYva}}}
\newmeaning{\artha{shwrxtaviVrasheYva, savxtaMtarxviVrasheYva eMdu eraDu vidha. vaNARsharxma dhamaRda AcaraNeyiMda saMpananxvAdudu shwrxta\-viVrasheYva. vaNARsharxmadhamaRda AcaraNeyilalxdudx savxtaMtarx viVrasheYva:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
viVrasheYvaM parxvakASxyXmi viditaM shurxtitaMtarxyoVH |\\
shwrxtaM savxtaMtarxmiti ca divxvidhaM parikiVtiRtamf ||\\
vaNARsharxmiVyadhamARDhayxM shwrxtamitayxBidhiVyateV |\\
tadiVyadhamaRrahitaM savxtaMtarxmiti kathayxteV ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 10. 30-31)}
\newmeaning{\artha{pUvaRshAMBaviV, utatxrashAMBaviV eMdu I muderxyu eraDu vidha. nAsikAgarxdaqSiTxyiMdalU, nAdAnu saMdhAna\-vanunx mADuva manasisxnoMdige kUDuva muderx pUvaR\-shAMBaviV eMdenisutatxde. nAsikAgarxdaqSiTx matutx manasusx nAdabarxhamxdalilx muLugidare utatxrashAMBaviV muderx eMdenisutatxde:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
shAMBaviV divxvidhA porxVkAtx pUvoRVtatxraviBeVdataH |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. yoV. parx., pu. 146)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
nAsAgarxdatatxnimiSoVnimxSabAhayxdaqSATxyX\\
lakeSxyXV sadAshivavimashaRkagUDhadaqSATxyX |\\
joyxVtiH savxrUpamacalaM haqdi bAhayxhiVnaM\\
pashayxMti yeV ta iha saMyaminaH kaqtAthARH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. yoV. parx., 5. 7)}
\newmeaning{\artha{shivajAcnxna, shivaBakitx, shivadhAyxna, shivavarxta, shivapUje eMdu shivayoVgavu aidu vidha:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
jAcnxnaM shivamayaM BakitxH sheYviV dhAyxnaM shivAtamxkamf |\\
sheYvavarxtaM shivAceRVti shivayoVgoV hi paMcadhA ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. yoV. parx., 1. 15)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{yoVga}}}
\newmeaning{\artha{vaMshayxshiSayx, AgaMtukashiSayx eMdu eraDu vidha. vaMshayxshiSayxnu matetx muKayx matutx sAmAnayx eMdu eraDu vidha. muKayx shiSayxnu barxhamxcAri, gaqhasathx eMdu eraDu vidha. barxhamxcAriyu paTATxdhikAri carapati, nirABAri eMdu mUru vidha. beVre vaMshadalilx janisida shiSayxnu AgaMtuka shiSayx eMdenisutAtxne:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
vaMshayx AgaMtukashecxVti divxvidhaH shiSayx ucayxteV |\\
muKayxH sAmAnayxH iteyxVvaM punavaRMshoyxV divxdhA mataH ||\\
barxhamxcAriV gaqhiV ceVti divxdhA muKoyxV viBidayxteV |\\
ukatxlakaSxNasaMpanonxV barxhamxcAriV punasitxrXdhA ||\\
paTATxBiSeVkavAnAdayxH yaH porxVkatxshacxrapatisatxthA |\\
nirABArasatxqqtiVyaH sAyxtf savaRloVkeVSu vishurxtaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(viV. sa. saM., 14. 2-4)}
\newmeaning{\artha{AcAra BeVdadiMda sheYvavu aneVka vidhavAgutatxde. AyA AcAragaLanunx parxtipAdisuva matavu AyA sheYvanAmagaLiMda kareyalapxDutatxve. sheYvavu eraDu vidha:}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(a) sheYva, viVrasheYva eMdu eraDu vidha:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sheYvaM ca viVrasheYvaM ca divxvidhaM sheYvamiVritamf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(viV. sa. saM., 8. 2)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(A) shwrxtasheYva, ashwrxtasheYva eMdu eraDu vidha:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sheYvaM tu divxvidhaM porxVkatxM shwrxtamashwrxtameVva ca |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sheY. ra., BA-2, 2. 23)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(i) nAlukx vidha-sAmAnayxsheYva, misharxsheYva, shudadhxsheYva, viVrasheYva eMdu nAlukx vidha:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sAmAnayxsheYvaM parxthamaM misharxsheYvaM tataH paramf ||\\
shudadhxsheYvaM tathA jecnxVyaM viVrasheYvaM tataH paramf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(vA. shu. A., 10. 10-11)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(I) aidu vidha-shudadhxsheYva, misharxsheYva, mAgaRsheYva, viVrasheYva, avAMtara sheYva eMdu aidu vidha:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
shudadhxsheYvaM misharxsheYvaM mAgaRsheYvaM taqtiVyakamf |\\
catuthaRM viVrasheYvaM ca paMcamoV{\char'263}vAMtarasatxthA ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(pAra. A., 17. 4)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(u) ELu vidha-(a) anAdisheYva, AdisheYva, mahAsheYva, anusheYva, avAMtarasheYva, parxvarasheYva, aMtayxsheYva eMdu ELu vidha:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sheYvAH sapatxvidhA jecnxVyAsetxVSAM BeVdAnf shaqNu karxmAtf |\\
anAdisheYvaH parxthamamAdisheYvasatxtaH paramf ||\\
mahAsheYvasatxtoV jecnxVyasatxvXnusheYvasatxtaH paramf |\\
avAMtarasatxtoV jecnxVyaH parxvarasatxdanaMtaramf ||\\
aMtayxsheYvasatxtoV jecnxVyaH... |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 7. 4-6)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{viVrasheYva, anAdisheYva, AdisheYva, anusheYva, mahAsheYva, yoVgasheYva, jAcnxnasheYva eMdu ELu vidha:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sheYvaM sapatxvidhaM puNayxM viVrasheYvAdi BeVdataH |\\
viVrasheYvaM tathAnAdisheYvamAdiparaM tataH ||\\
anusheYvaM mahAsheYvaM yoVgasheYvaM tu SaSaThxkamf |\\
sapatxmaM jAcnxnasheYvAKayxM... ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(pAra. A., 1. 15, 17)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(U) eMTu vidha-anAdisheYva, AdisheYva, pUvaRsheYva, misharxsheYva, shudadhxsheYva, sAmAnayxsheYva, viVrasheYva eMdu eMTu vidha:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
adhunA teV parxvakASxyXmi sheYvaBeVdamanutatxmamf |\\
anAdisheYvaM parxthamamAdisheYvaM divxtiVyakamf ||\\
pUvaRsheYvaM taqtiVyaM sAyxtf misharxsheYvaM catuthaRkamf |\\
shudadhxsheYvaM paMcamaM sAyxtf SaSaTxM veY mAgaRsheYvakamf ||\\
sAmAnayxM sapatxmaM jecnxVyaM viVrasheYvamathASaTxmamf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 10. 4-5)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{(Qu) hadineYdu vidha-AdisheYva, mahAsheYva, anusheYva, avAMtarasheYva, aMtayxsheYva, parxvarasheYva, sheYva, pAshupata, soVma, dakiSxNa, kAlAmuKa, lAkula, pUvaRsheYva, mAgaRsheYva, shudadhx\-sheYva eMdu hadineYdu vidha:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
AdisheYva mahAsheYvAdi SaTfsheYvAni BUyoV{\char'263}pi sheYvAH pAshupatA ituyxkAtxni sheYvAni SaTf pUvaRsheYvamAgaRsheYvashudadhxsheYvamiti sheYvatarxyamf EvaM paMcadashavidhAni sheYvAni |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a. viV. sA. saM., BA-1, pu. 11)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{ApeVkiSxka matutx anApeVkiSxka eMdu satayxvu eraDu vidha. maNuNx modalAdavugaLa savxrUpa ApeVkiSxka satayx, EkeMdare parxLayakAladalilx adara aBAvaviruvudeV Agide. barxhamxsavxrUpa anApeVkiSxka satayx. EkeMdare adu yAvAgalU iruvudeV Agide:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
tacacx satayxM divxvidhamf |\\
ApeVkiSxkamanApeVkiSxkaM ceVti |\\
maqdAdisavxrUpamApeVkiSxkaM satayxmf |\\
parxlayakAleV tasAyxpayxBAvAtf |\\
barxhamxsavxrUpamanApeVkiSxkamf |\\
tasayx sadA satAvxtf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-1, pu. 211)}
\newmeaning{\artha{nitayx, neYmititxka, kAmayx, nitayxneYmititxka, nitayxkAmayx eMdu sadAcAravu aidu vidha:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sadAcAraH bahuvidhAH parxmANeYrupavaNiRtAH |\\
saMkeSxVpataH paMcavidhA AcArAH niviRsheVSakAH ||\\
nitayxM neYmititxkaM kAmayxM nitayxneYmititxkaM tathA |\\
nitayxkAmayxmiti pArxhuH paMcadhA shAsatxrXkoVvidaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kirx. sA., BA-2, 5. 9-10)}
\newmeaning{\artha{barxhamxcAri, gaqhasathx, nirABAri eMdu sahaja jaMgama mUru vidha. I mUvaru utatxroVtatxravAgi sherxVSaThxru. ava\-ranunx vidhivatAtxgi pUjisabeVku:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
barxhamxcAriV gaqhiV ceYva nirABAriVti teV tarxyaH ||\\
yathoVtatxraM vishiSayxMteV pUjaniVyA yathAvidhi |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 4. 8)}
\newmeaning{\artha{I diVkeSxyu sabiVja, abiVja (nibiRVja), cinamxya eMdu mUru vidha. I mUru BeVda\-gaLu karxmavAgi kamaRkAMDa, BakitxkAMDa, jAcnxnakAMDagaLalilx sapxSaTxvAgive:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sA diVkASx tirxdhA porxVkAtx sabiVjAbiVjacinamxyA |\\
yathAkarxmaM kamaRBakitxjAcnxnakAMDeVSu tAH suPxTAH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi. ta. ra., 9. 7. 9)}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{BeVdaveMdare vayxtAyxsa athavA Binanxte eMbathaR alalxde, rahasayx, oLAthaR eMbathaRvU ide. (udA : adara BeVdavanariya ...iMtiV BeVdava tiLidu... 9:117)}

(savasaM. 1; basava. 965-258); I BeVdavanaridu nuDiyalu samadhAtuvAyitutx! guheVshavxraliMgakekx olida kAraNa, aBimAna lajejx beVsatutx hoVyitutx. (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 98-31); sAva jiVva biMduvina saMca sAyada nAda pArxNada saMca sAva jiVvada, sAyada pArxNada eraDara BeVdavanariyadidaRDe... (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 647-194); niVnu sakala niHkalAtamxkavAgi toLagi baLagutitxpapx BeVdava ariyabahude elalxrige ? (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 722-203); enanx nAnariyadalilx... ayAyx enonxLage initiduR meYdoVrada BeVdava nimamxlilx kaMDe kANA... (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 99-34).}}
