\meaning{\artha{AjAcnx, upamA, kalashABiSeVka, savxsitxkAroVhaNa, BUtipaTaTx, Ayatatx matutx sAvxyatatx eMdu kirxyAdiVkeSxyu ELu vidhavAgide:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
AjocnxVpamA ca kalasheYraBiSeVkasatxtaH paramf |\\
savxsitxkAroVhaNaM BUtipaTaTxmAyatatxmeVva ca |\\
sAvxyatatxmiti sapetxYtAH kirxyAdiVkASxMtarA matAH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM.A., kirx.pA., 9. 12; kA.A., kirx.pA., 1.43)}
\newmeaning{\artha{sUthxladhAraNA matutx sUkaSxmXdhAraNA eMdu dhAraNeyu eraDu
vidha. sUthxladhAraNA matetx dharaNiV, vAraNiV, AgenxVyiV, mArutiV, naBoVmayiV eMdu aidu vidha.
I aidu vidha sUthxlayoVgadiMda paMcapArxNagaLanunx niroVdhisuvudariMda vAta, pitathx,
kaPagaLiMda uMTAguva elalx haLeya roVga\-gaLu nivAraNeyAgutatxve:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
dharaNiV vAriNiV ceYvamAgenxVyiV mArutiV tathA |\\
naBoV mayiVti gadayxMteV sUriBiH paMcadhAraNAH ||\\
EtAsu BUmAyxdhikadhAraNAsu naqNAM sadA pArxNaniroVdhaneVna |\\
tirxdoVSajAsasxvaRpurANaroVgAH nashayxMti shiVGarxM na saMshayoV{\char'263}tarx ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi.yoV.parx., 3.36, 44)}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{niyama:}}
\newmeaning{\artha{varxta, shAsotxrXVkatxvAda kamaRda AcaraNe. 1)
koVpavilalxdiruvudu, guruseVve, shwca, alApxhAraseVvane, aparxmAda eMdu niyamavu aidu vidha:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
akorxVdhoV gurushushUrxSA shwcamAhAralAGavamf |\\
aparxmAdashacx paMceYteV niyamAsutx parxkiVtiRtAH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sha.tarx. pu. 4, sholxVka 22)}
\newmeaning{\artha{shwca, saMtoVSa, tapasusx, sAvxdhAyxya, IshavxraparxNidAna - ivugaLU aidu niyama\-gaLu:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
shwcasaMtoVSatapaH sAvxdhAyxyeVshavxraparxNidAnAni niyamAH |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(pA.yoV.sU., 2.32)}
\newmeaning{\artha{saMtoVSa, Asitxkayx, mati, tapasusx, varxta, IshavxrapUje, japa, hirxV, yoVgashAsatxrXsharxvaNa, satApxtarxdAna -I hatutx niyama\-gaLu:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
saMtoVSa AsitxkayxguNoV matishacx tapoV varxtaM shaMkarapUjanaM japaH |\\
hirxVyoVgashAsatxrXsharxvaNaM ca pAterxV parxdAnameVteV niyamAdasha samxqqtAH |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi.yoV.parx., 2.11)}
\newmeaning{\artha{ANava, mAyiVya, kAmiRka eMdu malavu mUru vidha. I mala\-gaLu karxmavAgi kAraNashariVra, sUkaSxmXshariVra, sUthxlashariVragaLige saMbaMdhisidudx mUru bageya diVkeSxgaLiMda ivu\-gaLu nAshavAgutatxve. veVdhAdiVkeSxyiMda BAvaliMgada sAthxpaneyiMda kAraNashariVradalilxna ANavamala, maMtarxdiVkeSxyiMda pArxNaliMgasAthxpane mADuvudariMda sUkaSxmXshariVradalilxna mAyiVyamala matutx kirxyAdiVkeSxyiMda iSaTxliMgavanunx sUthxlashariVradalilx sAthxpane mADuvudariMda A shariVradalilxna kAmiRkamalavu nAshavAgutatxve:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
ANavaM mAyikaM ceYva kAmiRkaM ca yathAkarxmamf |\\
malatarxyamanAdiVdaM tanutarxyagataM BaveVtf ||\\
tanutarxyagatAnAdimalatarxyamidaM guruH |\\
diVkASxtarxyeVNa nidaRgAdhxvX liMgatarxyamupAdisheVtf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(caM. A., kirx. pA., 3. 46-47; liM. dhA. caM., pu. 196)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
tanutarxyagatAnAdimalatarxyavishoVdhanAH |\\
liMgatarxyAnusaMdhAnavishoVSitaBavAbadhxyaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(makuTa., kirx. pA., 1. 11)}
\newmeaning{\artha{ANava, mAyiVya, kAmiRka, beYMdava eMdu malavu nAlukx vidha. mAyiVyamalavu kalAtatatxvXdiMda paqthi\-vayxMtavAda BuvanAdi savxrUpavuLaLxdudx. joyxVtiSoTxVma-barxhamxhatAyxdigaLiMda janisi apUvaRveMba hesaranunx paDeda saMsAkxra\-visheVSavu kamaR athavA kAmiRka baMdhavAgide. idu puyaRSaTxkadoLagina budidhxtatatxvXvanAnxsharxyisi suKa-duHKa-moVhagaLeMba PalagaLiMda kUDide. jiVvAtamxru beVre beVre rUpavAdAga ANavaveMba maladiMda AvaqtarAgutAtxre. idu jAcnxna-kirxyegaLanunx Avarisidudx jaDavU, \hbox{nitayxvU}, vAyxpakavU Agide. videyx, avideyx, IshavxrAdi shariVragaLa kAraNavU, sUkaSxmXdiMda veYKariyavaregina kAraNavU Adadudx beYMdava. I nAlukx bageya baMdhanagaLige mAyeyeV kAraNa. shudAdhxdhavxrige (shudadhxmAgaRdavarige) beYMdavapAshavuMTAdare, mishArxdhavxdavarige (misharxmAgaRdavarige) kAmiRka matutx ANavapAshagaLive. mAyiVya malavu ashudAdhxdhavxvatiRgaLige (ashudadhxmAgaRdavarige) aMTikoLuLxtatxde. beYMdava matutx mAyiVyapAsha\-gaLu AgaMtuka\-gaLu (naDuve baruvaMtahavu). ANavamalavu anAdi. adu maheVshavxrAnugarxhadiMda, sheYva\-diVkeSx\-yiMda kamARMtadalilx mAtarx nAshavAguvaMtahadudx. kAmaR\-malavu cidfjAcnxnayoVga saMnAyxsadiMda nAshavAguvaMtahadudx:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
mAyeVyamANavaM kAmaRM beYMdavaM ca catuSaTxyamf |\\
pAshAnAM kAraNiVBUtA teVSu baMdheVSu yA punaH ||\\
kalAdikapaqthivayxMtaBuvanAdi savxrUpavAnf ||\\
baMdhoV mAyiVyasaMjacnxsutx vidavxdiBxH parikiVtiRtAH |\\
joyxVtiSoTxVmabarxhamxhatAyxdutapxnonxV{\char'263}pUvaRsaMjacnxkaH ||\\
saMsAkxraH kamaRshabedxVna baMdhoV{\char'263}nayxH parikiVtayxRteV |\\
puyaRSaTxkAMtaragataM budidhxtatatxvXmupAshirxtaH ||\\
suKaduHKavimoVhAdiPalayukatxshacx jAyateV |
\end{shl}
\begin{shl}
baMdhoV malABidhAnasutx savxrUpANAyxtamxnAM paqthakf ||\\
jAcnxnakirxyAM ca satataM samAvaqtayx vayxvasithxtaH |\\
nitayxshacx vAyxpakashecxYva BaveVdapi jaDAtamxkaH ||\\
vidAyxvideyxVshavxrAdiVnAM shAriVrANAM ca kAraNamf |\\
sUkASxmXdi veYKayaRMtasayx kAraNaM beYMdavABidhaH ||
shudAdhxdhavxvatiRnAM biMduroVdhw pAshavuBw matw ||\\
mishArxdhavxvatiRnAmukwtx dwvx dwvx kAmARNavABidhw |\\
EvameVtadidhx badAdhxnAM catuSaTxyamudAhaqtamf ||\\

\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4. 37-39)}
\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxra maMtarxdalilxna Aru akaSxra\-gaLu para modalAda saMjecnx\-gaLu. yakAravu parasaMjecnx, vAkAravu gUDharUpa, \hbox{shikAravu} shariVrada rUpa, makAravu liMgakeSxVtarxda rUpa, nakAravu anAdirUpa, parxNavavu mahAnfrUpavAgide:}}

\begin{shl}

\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4. 40)}
\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxra maMtarxdalilxna Aru akaSxra\-gaLu ArushakitxgaLa vAcaka\-gaLu. yakAravu parAshakitx, vAkAravu Adishakitx, shikAravu icACxshakitx, makAravu jAcnxnashakitx, nakAravu kirxyAshakitx, OMkAravu cicaCxkitxya savxrUpadAdxgide:}}

\begin{shl}

kirxyAshakitxnaRkAraH sAyxtf parxNavoV hi cidAtamxkaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4-41)}
\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxra maMtarxdalilxna Aru vaNaR\-gaLu Aru sAdAKayx vAcaka\-gaLu. yakAravu shivasAdAKayx, vAkAravu amUtaRsAdAKayx, shikAravu mUtaRsAdAKayx, makAravu kataqqRsAdAKayx, nakAravu kamaRsAdAKayx, OMkAravu mahAsAdAKayxda savxrUpadavugaLAgive:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
parxthamaM shivasAdAKayxmamUtaRM ca tataH paramf |\\

kamaRsAdAKayxmaparaM mahArUpamanaMtaramf |\\

\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4. 42-43)}
\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxra maMtarxda Aru akaSxra\-gaLu Aru liMgasathxla vAcaka\-gaLu. yakAravu parxsAdaliMga, vAkAravu caraliMga, shikAravu shivaliMga, makAravu guruliMga, nakAravu AcAraliMga matutx OMkAravu mahAliMgada vAcaka\-gaLu:}}

\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4. 44)}
\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxramaMtarxda Aru akaSxra\-gaLu SaTfsathxla vAcaka\-gaLu. yakAravu sharaNasathxla, vAkAravu pArxNaliMgisathxla, shikAravu parxsAdisathxla, makAravu mAheVshavxrasathxla, nakAravu Bakatxsathxla matutx OMkAravu aikayxsathxla vAcaka\-gaLu:}}

\begin{shl}

mAheVshavxrashacx Bakatxshacx SaTfsathxlAtAmx SaDakaSxraH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4. 45)}
\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxra\-gaLu Aru vidha hasatxrUpa\-gaLu. yakAravu BAva, vAkAravu jAcnxna, shikAravu manasf, makAravu nirahaMkAra, nakAravu budidhx matutx OMkAravu citatxda savxrUpavAgive:}}

\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4. 46)}
\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxra\-gaLu Aru vidha barxhamxvAcaka\-gaLu. yakAravu barxhamx, vAkAravu viSuNx, shikAravu rudarx, makAravu Ishavxra, nakAravu sadAshiva matutx OMkAravu parashivana savxrUpavAgive:}}

\begin{shl}

\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4. 47)}
\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxra\-gaLu Aru baNaNxgaLa vAcaka\-gaLu. yakAra saPxTika vaNaR, vAkAra biLiya baNaNx, shikAra niVlibaNaNx, makAra ratanxparxBeya baNaNx, nakAra haLadi baNaNx matutx OMkAravu vaNARtiVtavAdudu:}}

\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4. 48-49)}
\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxragaLalilx yakAravu BUmi, vAkAravu niVru, shikAravu beMki, makAravu vAyu, nakAravu AkAragaLige biVjagaLAgive. OMkAravu elalx tatatxvXgaLa biVjavAgide:}}

\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4. 50-51)}
\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxra\-gaLu IshAdi deVvategaLa parxtiVkavAgive. yakArakekx Isha, vAkArakekx maheVsha, shikArakekx shiva, makArakekx videyx, nakArakekx AtAmx matutx OMkArakekx parashiva ivaru\-gaLu deVvate\-gaLu:}}

\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU. A., kirx. pA., 4. 52)}
\newmeaning{\artha{SaDakaSxra\-gaLu veVdajAcnxnavAcaka\-gaLu. yakAravu sAvira veVdagaLaMte, vAkAravu athavaRNveVda, shikAravu sAmaveVda, makAravu yajuveRVda, nakAravu QugevxVda matutx OMkAravu sAkASxtf jAcnxna savxrUpavAgive:}}

\begin{entry}
\word{yoVgaparxmANa}
\meaning{\arthanonum{yoVga eMba padavu oMdu vishiSaTx athaRdalilx samAdhisithxtige anavxyisutatxde. vacanakArara parxkAra, aikayxnu samAdhisithxtiyalilx (liMgAMgasAmarasayx sithxtiyalilx) iruvAga,
 avana Atamxvu paramAtamxnalilx aikayxvAgutitxruvudu savxlapx
 hotitxna modaleV gotAtxgi, paramAtamxnalilx tAnu oMdAgiruvAga,
 avanige tananx bagegAgali paramAtamxna bagegAgali
 arivAguvudilalx. anaMtara avanu jAgaqtasithxtige hiMdirugidAga,
 tananx aikayxsithxtiya bagegx jAcnxpaka barutatxde. idanunx nidedxya
upameya mUlaka hiVge vivarisabahudu: nAvu gADhaniderxyanunx
parxveVshisuva modalu gADhaniderxyanunx parxveVshisuvudara
arivAgutatxde. gADhaniderx baMda naMtara A sithxtiyalilxruva
arivu namagAguvudilalx. nidedxyiMda ececxtatx naMtara namage nidedx
baMdidudx\-dara jAcnxpaka baMdu, nanage gADhaniderx baMditutx
enunxtetxVve. hAgeyeV yoVga (samAdhi) sithxti paDedu, jAgaqta
sithxtige baMda\-vanu Atamx matutx paramAtamx iruvudu satayxveMdU, Atamx
paramAtamxra saMyoVga sAdhayxveMdU, adakekx tananx yoVgaveV (samAdhisithxtiyeV) parxmANaveMdU heVLuvanu (va.pa.koV. 313)}}
\newmeaning{\ni{yoVgasayx parxmANaM - yoVgaparxmANaM; yoVgaH parxmANaM yasayx tatf - yoVgaparxmANaM}}
\end{entry}

\pauthor{(shi. ta. ra., 1. 3. 8)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{SaTAsxdAKayxgaLige adhideVvategaLAgiruva parashiva, sadAshiva, shiva, rudarx, viSuNx matutx barxhamx eMbuvaralilx obabx:}
\ullekha{A \hbox{shivana} mUtiRyiMda rudarxnAda, A rudarxna mUtiRyiMda viSuNx\-vAda (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 1576-468); urutararahasayxdoLagoVMkAraveV kaNA parashivaM baLikA yakArane sadAshivaM parikisalu vAkAraviVshaM shikArave rudarxM makAraveraDu vara\-biMduviM viSuNxvA nakAraM ...barxhamxM (viVsheYpu. 1-5-55); SaTasxthXla barxhamxmUtiRgaLu - oMdoMdu sAdAKayxkekx obobxbabx adhideVvategaLirutAtxre. ivaru parashivana savxrUpagaLeV eMdu heVLabahudu... 1. parashiva athavA sharaNa athavA jaMgama athavA Atamx, 2. sadAshiva, 3. shiva, 4. rudarx, 5. viSuNx, 6. barxhamx (\hbox{shivAkoV.} 15-25).} \artha{saqSiTxya AraMBakAladalilx barxhamxna BUrxmadhayxdiMda utapxtitxgoMDa hanonxMdu jana gaNadeVvate\-gaLalilx obabx:} \ullekha{QuSitatiyaSaTx dikApxla rudarxreVkAdasharf (shivAciM 13-3); aSaTxvasugaLu panenxraDinaru panonxMdurudarxru barxhamxroMbatutx neredu Bajisalu (basapu. 9-31).} \artha{Bakatxna sAdhaneyiMda SaTacxkarxgaLalilx nelegoLuLxva AcAra, guru, shiva, jaMgama, parxsAda matutx mahAliMgagaLeMba SaDilxMgagaLige saMbaMdhisiruva aivatutx jana rudarxru:}

shivaBakatxru rudArxkaSxvanunx nitayx dharisuvudariMda avara elalx pApagaLu nAshavAgutatxve. rudArxkiSxgaLu visheVSavAgi kAshimxVra, neVpALa matutx himAlaya parxdeVshagaLalilx beLeyuva oMdu bageya maradalilx biDutatxve:}}

\begin{entry}

\begin{shl}

I hadineYdu BakatxsathxlaMgaLu (savasaM. 14; SaNumxKa. 780-355); A mahAmahimanaMtadA sUthxlatanu vilasita vayxvahAramaM tavisutaM sadAcArasadavxtaRnege sAdhanavadAgi nalidu muMteyaMgada meVle liMgasusAvxyata\-vadeMtAdudenalAgi ...liMgadhAraNasathxlavalA (viVsheYpu. 8-125-14,15); gurukaruNAnivxta mahAtamxMge paMca\-BUtAtamxka sUthxladeVha dhamaRMgaLaM pariharisi sadAcAra sAdhaniVBUta deVhada meVle liMgadhAraNavanesagalade liMgadhAraNasathxlavAdudu (keYvasha. 16-1 sUtarxM).}}

\begin{entry}

\ullekha{anAmika madhayxmegaLa madhayxdalilx naviVna\-kusumaviDidu aMguSaThx tajaRnigaLiM modala nimARlayxmaM tayxjisi liMgapiVThamaM vAriyiM parxkASxlanaMgeYvudeV liMgashudidhxyenisuvudu (viveVka. 93).}

\ullekha{nakAramAtamx shudidhxshacx makAraM sAnxnashoVdhanaM shikAraM liMgashudidhxshacx vAkAraM darxvayxshoVdhanaM yakAraM maMtarxshudidhxshacx paMcashudidhxH parxkiVtiRtAH (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 851-253); matatxmA shivapUjAvidhige deVsha kAla sAthxna darxvayx parxyoVjanAdigaLaM... kirxyegaLaM, Atamxshudidhx sAthxna\-shudidhx darxvayxshudidhx [liMgashudidhx] maMtarx (savasaM. 9; shAMtaviV. 1400-537),}}

\begin{entry}
\word{vacana}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{I padavanunx vacanakAraru aneVka athaRgaLalilx baLasidAdxre:}
\artha{basavaNaNxnavara vacana, Adayxra vacana, eMbalilx oMdu sheYliya baravaNige eMdAgutatxde. sAmAnayxvAgi gadayxrUpa\-dalilxdadxrU kAvayxda usiru hoMdiruva I sheYliyanenxV nAvu vacana enunxtetxVve. vacana eMba padavu anuBAviya mAtige anavxyisutatxde. satayxvanunx neVravAgi anuBavisida avanige yAvudara nibaRMdhavilalxdudariMda, avanu mAtarx AdhAyxtimxka viSayagaLa bagege adhikArayutavAgi mAtanADabalalx. idaralilx kaSaTxpaTuTx bareyuvaMthadeVnU ilalx. anuBAvigaLige vacanagaLu parxyatanxvilalxdeyeV horabarutatxve.}
\artha{AgamagaLa mAtu:} \ullekha{`ahaM savaRjagatf katAR, mamakatAR maheVshavxra eMdu viSuNx heVLida vacanava marediralalx' (savasaM. 1; basava. 584-146).}

\begin{entry}

\meaning{\arthanonum{`yoVga' eMba padavu `yujf' eMba dhAtuviniMda vuyxtapxtitxyAgidudx, adakekx `kUTa' (`kUDuvudu' athavA `bereyuvudu') eMba athaRvide. sAmAnayxvAgi, I athaRda AdhArada meVle `yoVgaveMdare Atamxvu paramAtamxnalilx bereyuvudu' eMdu heVLalAguvudu. ideV athaRda AdhArada meVle, `jiVvanu shivanoMdige bereyuvudeV shivayoVga' enanxbahudu. shivananunx seVruvudu shivayoVgigaLa dheyxVya.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad `yoVga' eMba padakekx `mAgaR' eMba athaRvU ide. udAharaNege, BakitxyoVga, kamaRyoVga eMba padagaLige BakitxmAgaR, kamaRmAgaR eMba payARya padagaLU ive. \hbox{Bakitx} athavA kamaRmAgaRda mUlaka paramAtamxnanunx seVruvudu eMbudu I padagaLa athaR. adeV riVti, shivayoVgaveMdare shivananunx seVruva mAgaR, shivapatha eMbathaRvU ide.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad vacanakArara parxkAra, manuSayx parashivanalalx, parashivanAgalAra, Adare avanalilx shivAMshavide. avanu mUlataH parashivana aMga (BAga athavA deVha). Adare avanu I satayxvanunx maretu, tAnu savxtaMtarx, aMgaBoVgaveV jiVvanada paramoVdedxVsha, Barxmisi eMdu tapupx tiLidu, nAnA riVtiya AsegaLigoLagAgi, avugaLanunx pUreYsikoLaLxlu nAnA riVtiya kamaRgaLanunx mADi, avugaLa PalagaLanunx anuBavisalu nAnA riVtiya janamxgaLanenxtitx, saMsAkxrakekx badadhxnAgi, aneVka riVtiya duHKagaLanunx anuBavisutAtxne. I duHKavanunx uMTumADuva kamaRvanunx dhavxMsa mADi, saMsArabaMdhanadiMda tapipxsikoMDu, tAnu deVheVMdirxyAdi karaNagaLalalx, shivana aMga\-vAda Atamx eMba jAcnxnavanunx paDedu, punaH modalinaMte shivanoMdige sAmarasayx paDeyuvudeV shivayoVgada dheyxVya. idanunx paDeyalu agatayxvAda shakitxgaLanunx avanu horaginiMda paDeyabeVkAgilalx, avu avanalelxV ive. adanunx sariyAda guruvina mAgaRdashaRnadalilx jAgarxtagoLisi, avugaLanunx shivABimuKavAgi mADidare, shivayoVga saPalavAdaMteyeV (va.pa.koV. 359).}

\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad shirxV niVlakaMTha shivAcAyaRru viVrasheYva sidAdhxMtavanunx `shivAdevxYta' eMdu parxtipAdisidAdxre. idakekx shakitxvishiSATxdevxYta, visheVSAdevxYta, SaTfsathxla-liMgAMga sAmarasayx, shivayoVga, mahApAshupata eMba hesarugaLU ive. shivAgamagaLalilx I elalx hesarugaLiMda kUDiruva I sidAdhxMtavanunx `viVrasheYva' hesariniMda kareyutAtxre. `viV' eMba akaSxravu shiva-jiVvada aikayxboVdhakavAda videyxyanunx boVdhisutatxde. aMtaha videyxyalilx `ra' ramisatakakx (AnaMdisatakakx) yAva sheYva\-ruMToV avareV `viVrasheYva'renisutAtxre. shivAdevxYta eMdare shivanalilx oMdAguvike. parashivaceYtanayxvu tananx icACxshakitxya vashadiMda malatarxyagaLa saMbaMdhadiMda shariVratarxyagaLanunx (sUthxla-sUkaSxmX-kAraNa) hoMdi, kaTiTxgeya beMkiyu aneVka kiDigaLAgi AviBaRvisuvaMte anaMta jiVvarugaLa BAravanunx hoMdu\-tatxde. tananx neYja savxrUpavanunx maremAcikoMDiruva parashiva ceYtanayxvu tananxlilxya shakitxvikAsadiMdAgi malatarxyagaLanunx dUramADi\-koLuLxva kAraNa shariVratarxyada saMbaMdhavanunx kaLedukoMDu, nadigaLu samudarxdalilx liVnavAguvAga tamamx tamamx hesaru, rUpagaLanunx kaLedukoLuLxva hAge, tananx mUlasavxrUpavAda AnaMdarasadalilx liVnavAgi tAneV tAnAgi Agutatxde. jiVvaru shivanalilx seVruva I parxkirxyeyeV `shivAdevxYta':}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
viVshabedxVnoVcayxteV vidAyx shivajiVveYkayx boVdhiniV |\\[1pt]
tasAyxM ramaMteV yeV sheYvAH viVrasheYvAH parxkiVtiRtAH |
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(si.shi. 5.16)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
shivAdevxYtamitayxtarx...savxyameVva BavatiVti |
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(shivA.pa. parxka.-9, ga.BA.-4, pu. 100-101)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad viVrasheYvadalilx padeV padeV baruva `shivAdevxYta' eMba padakekx ``devxYtAdevxYta" athavA ``shakitxvishiSATxdevxYta" eMba athaRvanunx koDabahudu. shivAdevxYta eMdare iruvavanu shivanobabxneV eMba sidAdhxMta. hAgAdare, aneVka BwtavasutxgaLiMda kUDida jagatUtx aneVka jiVvigaLU iveyalalx eMba saMdeVha barutatxde. shaMkarAcAyaRra cidadevxYtada parxkAra barxhamxnobabxneV satayx, AtamxgaLa aneVkateyU BwtaparxpaMcavU asatayx. Adare viVrasheYvada shivAdevxYta eMdare, AtamxgaLU jagatUtx asatayx alalx, avu shivanoLageV aDagirutatxve. jiVva jagatutx matutx Ishavxrara naDuvaNa saMbaMdhavanunx viVrasheYvadalilx samudarx matutx noreteregaLa saMbaMdhakekx hoVlisalAgide. samudarxvilalxdidadxre, teregaLU noreyU iralu sAdhayxvilalx. samudarxveV avugaLa asitxtavxkekx kAraNa. hAgeyeV parashivaneV ilalxdidadxre, jagatutx jiVvagaLu irutitxralilalx. EkeMdare, avugaLu avaniMda vayxkatxvAgutatxve. eraDaneyadAgi, teregaLU noreyU samudarxda oMdu avasethx. avugaLa rUpa AkAra badalAgabahudu. Adare avugaLa AdhAra badalAguvudilalx. hAgeyeV jiVva jagatutx parashivana vividha avasethxgaLu, avugaLa nAmarUpagaLu badalAgabahudAdarU, avugaLa AdhAra mAtarx parashivaneV. athavA Bititx oMdaralilx beVre beVre kAlagaLalilx beVre beVre citarxgaLanunx heVge racisabahudoV, hAgeyeV parashivaneMba AdhArada meVle beVre beVre kAlagaLalilx beVre beVre jagatutxgaLu beVre beVre jiVvarAshigaLU kANisikoLaLxbahudu.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad idariMda vayxkatxvAguva aMshavidu: noreyataraMgagaLu samudarxdiMda BinanxvAgirade, adara aMgagaLAgiruva hAgeyeV, jiVva jagatutx parashivaniMda BinanxvAgirade avana aMga(BAga)vAgive. AdudariMda nijavAgi, shivanobabxneV iruvavanu. I sidAdhxMtaveV shivAdevxYta:}
\ullekha{liMgavu keYlAsada shivana kuruhAdudariMda pUjayxveMbaru: sharaNanu manuja\-nAdudariMda avanu pUjakaneMbaru. iMtiV \hbox{keVvala} BeVda\-saMbaMdha kalipxsuva BavaBArigaLu shivAdevxYtakekx dUravAgipapxru kaMDA (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1335-472); shivAdevxYtajAcnxnadalilxyalalxde AtAmxdevxYtajAcnxnadalilx mUla avideyx keDedu noVDayAyx (savasaM. 6; Adayayx. 1028-317).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{shivayoVH adevxYtaM - shivAdevxYtaM}}
\end{entry}

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad I mUru parxBeVdagaLigiMta viVrasheYvavu utatxmavAdudu. viVrasheYvaporxVkatx AcAragaLu bahaLa sulaBavAduvu. alalxde A AcAradiMda laBayxvAdaMtha jAcnxnavu athavA liMgAMga aikayxvu keYlAsa muMtAda lABagaLigiMta hecicxnadu. viVrasheYvanu jAcnxna athavA videyxyalilx (`vi') ramisuvavanu (`ra') athavA vinoVdisutitxruvavanu eMdAdudariMda avanu shamadamAdi SaTfsaMpatitxyiMda shoVBisutitxrutAtxne, alalxde avanu mAyeyanunx gedadxvanAdudariMda avananunx viVramAheVshavxraneMdU kareyalAgutatxde. shiveYkayxrAda viVrasheYvaru jAcnxnayajacnxdalilx niratarAgirutAtxre. avarige yAva sAvxthaRpara AsegaLU ilalxvAdudariMda avaru kamaRyoVgigaLU hwdu. itara sheYvaru mADabeVkeMdu iciCxsidadhx elalx satAkxyaRgaLanUnx viVrasheYvaru bahiraMgadalilx mADi toVrisutAtxre. bahaLa kirxyegaLanunx mADi alapx Palavanunx paDeyuvudu itara sheYva parxBeVdagaLa guNa\-vAdare, alapx kirxyegaLanunx mADi bahaLa Palavanunx paDeyuvudu viVshasheYvada guNavAgide.}}

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad shudadhxviVrasheYvaru mADuva diVkASxvidhAnavanunx anusarisi, shivakuMBavanunx sAthxpisi, adaralilxruva shivananunx pUjisi, diVkoSxVtasxvakekx baMdiruva oDeyarugaLanunx saMtuSaTxgoLisuva saluvAgi avarige viBUti viVLeyavanunx koDuvavanu visheVSa viVrasheYva. avanu guru heVLida elalx diVkASxkamaRgaLanunx mADuvudalalxdeV tananx malatarxyagaLanUnx nimURlana mADikoLuLxtAtxne. shivAcAyaRnu aMtha visheVSa viVrasheYva shiSayxnanunx kaqpAdaqSiTxyiMda noVDi, avana deVhavanunx citf shariVravanAnxgi mADutAtxne. anaMtara diVkiSxtanu SaTfcakarx, SaDaMga matutx SaDadhavxgaLanunx jAgaqtagoLisutAtxne. visheVSa viVrasheYvanu tananx deVha matutx pArxNa beVrAgada hAge vatiRsutAtxne, aMdare avanu liMgadalilx pArxNavaninxrisi tananx elalx kelasa matutx ciMtanegaLanunx liMgABimuKavAgi mADutAtxne.}}

\begin{entry}
\word{SaDivxdha liMgadhAraNe}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{namamx jAcnxneVMdirxya matutx kameRVMdirxyagaLu shakitxya vividha rUpAMtaragaLu. parxtiyoMdu iMdirxyadalilxyU oMdoMdu liMgavidudx, A liMga\-gaLU saha parashivana vividha avataraNikegaLAgive. shakitxya vividha rUpAMtaragaLalilxruva liMgada vividha avataraNike\-gaLanunx sAdhakanu vividha haMtagaLalilx olisikoLuLxtAtxne. idanenxV vacanakAraru SaDivxdha liMgadhAraNe eMdu karedidAdxre. yAva haMtadalilx yAva liMgavanunx olisikoLaLxbeVkeMbudakekx vivara.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{paqthivxtatatxvXvu GArxNeVMdirxya matutx gudagaLAgi vikasitagoMDide. alilx nivaqtitxkaleyeMba Bakitx ide. A kaleyalilx kirxyAshakitxyutavAda AcAraliMgavidudx, sAdhakanu adanunx Bakatxsathxladalilx dharisi, BakatxnenisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{jihevx matutx guhayx apf tatatxvXda vikasita rUpagaLu. alilx parxtiSAThxkaleyeMba Bakitx ide, adaralilx jAcnxnashakitxyutavAda guruliMga idudx, adanunx dharisida sAdhakanu maheVshanenisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{neVtarx matutx pAdagaLu aginxtatatxvXda rUpAMtara. avugaLalilx vidAyxkaleyeMba Bakitx ide, adaralilx icACxshakitxyutavAda shivaliMga idudx, adanunx dharisidavanu parxsAdiyenisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{tavxkukx matutx pANigaLu vAyutatatxvXda rUpAMtara. avugaLalilx shAMtikalA eMba Bakitxyide. adaralilx Adishakitx\-yuta\-vAda jaMgamaliMgavidudx adanunx dharisidavanu pArxNaliMgi enisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{shorxVtarx matutx vAgiMdirxyagaLu parAshakitxya beVre rUpagaLu. avugaLalilx shAMtayxtiVta kaleyeMba Bakitxyidudx, adaralilx parAshakitxyutavAda parxsAdaliMgavidudx, adanunx dharisikoMDAta sharaNanenisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{Atamx eMba aMgakekx manasesxMba cicaCxkitxrUpada \hbox{shakitxyidudx}, adaroLage shAMtayxtiVtoVtatxra kale eMba Bakitx ide, adaralilxruva cicaCxkitxyutavAda mahAliMgavanunx dharisidavanu aikayx nenesikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{meVle heVLida Aru liMgagaLu manuSayxna karaNeVMdirxyagaLalilx AgaleV ive. avanunx hosadAgi avanu iSaTxliMgadaMte dharisabeVkAgilalx. avanalilx iruva shakitxgaLeV A liMgagaLanunx \hbox{mucicxve}. sAdhakanu kalegaLeMba BakitxgaLa sahAyadiMda, A shakitxgaLanunx pAradashaRka mADi, avugaLalilxruva liMgavanunx noVDidare, liMgadhAraNe mADidaMteyeV. shakitxgaLanunx pAradashaRka mADuvudeMdare, avugaLa duguRNagaLanunx tegedu, avugaLa duvaRtaRneyanunx taDedu, avugaLanunx AdhAyxtimxka udedxVshakAkxgi baLasikoLuLxvudu (va.pa.koV. 381).}
\ullekha{iMtiV SaDusathxla Bakatxru \hbox{SaDivxdha} liMgava dharisi nirALaliMgAcaRneya mADutitxharu (savasaM. 11; savxtaMtarx 856-435)}}
\newmeaning{\ni{SaDivxdhaM ca tatatf liMgadhAraNaM ca - SaDivxdhaliMgadhAraNaM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}

\meaning{\arthanonum{AdhAyxtimxka sAdhaneya oMdu haMtadalilx, iMdirxyagoVcaravAda hAgU BoVjayxyoVgayxvAda vasutxgaLanunx parashivanige apiRsi avugaLanunx parxsAda mADikoLuLxvudu oMdu vayxthaR kirxye eMba arivu mUDutatxde. EkeMdare parxsAdada nijavAda athaR iSaTxkekxV siVmitavAgilalx. nAvu iMdirxyagaLa mUlaka EneVnanunx anuBavisutetxVveyoV avelalxvanUnx parxsAdaveMbaMteyeV sivxVkarisabeVku. I athaRdalilx tegedukoMDare, namamx deVhadalilxruva Aru liMgagaLige rUparasagaMdhAdigaLanunx apiRsi, avanunx parxsAdaveMbaMte AmeVle sivxVkarisidare, Aga nAvu nijavAda parxsAdigaLenisikoLuLxtetxVve. hiVge nAvu GArxNisuva munanx AcAraliMgakekx apiRsidare, A vAsane AcAraliMgada parxsAdavAgutatxde. adeV riVti nAvu rucisidedxlalx guruliMgada parxsAda, noVDidedxlalx shivaliMgada parxsAda, sapxshiRsidedxlAlx jaMgamaliMgada parxsAda, keVLidedxlAlx parxsAdaliMgada parxsAda hAgU namamx iMdirxyagaLU, utatxmavAdudelalxvU mahAliMgada parxsAda. hiVge tAnu anuBavisuva munanx elalxvanUnx liMga\-kakxpiRsuvavanu savARMgaparxsAdi (va.pa.koV. 382):} \ullekha{Ata GArxNisidudx AcAraliMga, Ata rucisidedxlalx guruliMgaparxsAda Ata noVDidedxlalx shivaliMgaparxsAda, Ata sapxshaRna mADidedxlalx jaMgamaliMgaparxsAda, Ata keVLidedxlalx parxsAdaliMgaparxsAda Atana saveRVMdirxyavelalx paripUNaRvAdadedx mahAliMgaparxsAda (savasaM. 10; cenanxkaM. 824-488).}}

\begin{entry}
\word{SaDivxdhaviBUtidhAraNe}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{shivaBakatxrAdavarelalxrU viBUti dharisabeVkeMba niyamavide. Adare yArAyxru yAvAva sathxladalilx dharisidare yAvAva lABagaLuMTAgutatxve eMbu\-danunx cenanxbasavaNaNxnavaru I riVti tiLisikoDutAtxre:}}
\newmeaning{\artha{sahajaliMgadhArakaru viBUtiyanunx tamamx shariVrada eMTu sAthxnagaLalilx dharisabeVku, hAge dharisidavarige gurudiVkeSxyuMTAgutatxde.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{kirxyAdiVkeSx paDeda upAdhika Bakatxru tamamx shariVrada hadinAru sAthxnagaLalilx viBUtidhAraNe mADabeVku; hAge mADidare, avarige guruliMgajaMgamada sadaBxkitx Palisuvudu.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{kirxyAdiVkeSx matutx maMtarxdiVkeSx paDeda nirupAdhika Bakatxru tamamx aMgada mUvatetxraDu sAthxnagaLalilx viBUtidhAraNe mADabeVku; hAge mADidare, avaru tirxvidha pAdoVdaka parxsAdakekx yoVgayxrAgutAtxre.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{kirxyAdiVkeSx, maMtarxdiVkeSx matutx veVdhAdiVkeSx paDeda \hbox{sahaja} Bakatxru tamamx shariVrada mUvatAtxru sAthxnagaLalilx viBUtiyanunx dharisabeVku. hAge mADidare avarige sacicxdAnaMda pada doreyutatxde.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{kirxyAdiVkeSx, maMtarxdiVkeSx, veVdhAdiVkeSx matutx sacicxdAnaMda diVkeSxyanunx paDeda nivaRMcana Bakatxru nalavatutxnAlukx sAthxnagaLalilx viBUtiyanunx dharisabeVku. hAge mADidare avarige nivARNapada laBisutatxde.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{koneyadAgi, kirxyAdiVkeSx, maMtarxdiVkeSx, veVdhAdiVkeSx, sacicxdAnaMdadiVkeSx matutx nivARNapadadiVkeSxgaLanunx paDeda sadaBxkatxru tamamx aMgada nAlavxtetxMTu sAthxnagaLalilx maMtarxvanunx paThisutAtx viBUtidhAraNe mADabeVku, hAge mADidare avarige, jaMgamaroDanATa matutx parashivanoDane kUTa uMTAgi, koneyalilx niravaya samAdhi uMTAgutatxde (va.pa.koV. 382):}
\ullekha{ayAyx, viBUtiya dharisuva BeVdaveMteMdaDe: sahaja liMga\-dhArakaru eMTu sAthxnadalilx dharisuvudayAyx. kirxyAdiVkeSx, maMtarxdiVkeSx, veVdhA diVkeSxyukatxrAda sahajaBakatxru mUvatAtxru sAthxnadalilx dharisuvudayAyx. kirxyAdiVkeSx, maMtarxdiVkeSxyukatxrAda nirupAdhiBakatxru mUvatetxraDu sAthxnadalilx dharisuvudayAyx kirxyAdiVkASxnivxtarAda upAdiBakatxru hadinAru sAthxnadalilx dharisuvudayAyx kirxyAdiVkeSx maMtarxdiVkeSx, veVdhAdiVkeSx, sacicxdAnaMdadiVkASxyukatxrAda nivaRMcana Bakatxru. nAlavxtutxnAlukx sAthxnadalilx dharisuvudayAyx. kirxyA-maMtarx-veVdhA-sacicxdAnaMda - nivARNapadadiVkASxsamanipxtarAda sadaBxkatxsharaNagaNaMgaLu. apAdamasatxka pariyaMtara sAnxna dhULanava mADi nAlavxtetxMTu sAthxnadalilx maMtarxsamxraNeyiMda tirxpuMdarxva dharisuvudayAyx kUDala cenanxsaMgamadeVvA (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 931-295).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{SaDivxdhaM ca tataf viBUteVH dhAraNaM ca - SadivxdhaviBUtidhAraNaM}}
\end{entry}

I Aru vidhada shakitxgaLige anukarxmavAgi nivaqtitxkale, parxtiSAThxkale, vidAyxkale, shAMtikale, shAMtayx\-tiVtakale, shAMtayxtiVtoVtatxrakale eMba payARya hesarugaLive:}}

\begin{entry}
\word{SaDivxdhasamapaRNe}

\meaning{\arthanonum{Bakatxnu tanage baMda padAthaR\-gaLanunx guruliMgajaMgamakUkx, puSapx modalAda sugaMdhavasutxgaLanunx AcAraliMgakUkx samapiRsabeVku. haNuNx modalAda rasaBarita vasutxgaLanunx maheVshanu guruliMgakekx samapiRsabeVku; piVta, shevxVta muMtAda vasAtxrXdigaLanunx, aMdare avugaLa rUpanunx, pArxsAdiyu shivaliMgakekx samapiRsabeVku; kwpiVna, uDudAra muMtAda yAvAgalU namamxnunx muTuTxtitxruva padAthaR\-gaLanunx (aMdare, sapxshaRnavanunx) pArxNaliMgiyu tananx satikxrXyegaLa mUlaka jaMgamaliMgakekx samapiRsabeVku; shabodxV\-tApxdaka vasutxgaLAda gaMTe, taMtivAdayxgaLu muMtAda vasutxgaLanunx (aMdare shabadxvanunx) sharaNanu parxsAdaliMgakekx samapiRsabeVku; koneyadAgi, aikayxnu tanenxlalxvanUnx mahAliMgakekx samapiRsi, paripUNaR taqpitx paDeyabeVku.}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad Adare ililx vacanakAraru, I riVti apiRtavAguva vasutxgaLu satayxshudadhx kAyakadiMda baMdiruvaMthAdAdxgirabeVkeMdu ecacxrisutAtxre (va.pa.koV. 383):} 
\ullekha{I SaDivxdha \hbox{darxvayx} padAthaRMgaLu doreyadidadxre mUlacitatx moda\-lAda aMga mana pArxNa iMdirxya karaNa viSayaMgaLa A shirxVguruviMge jaMgamada somumxsaMbaMdhadalilx nilisuvude savARMgaliMgApaRNavAgipuRdu (savasaM. 14; mUrumu. ???-???)}}

\begin{entry}
\word{SaDivxdhahasatx}
\meaning{\arthanonum{Bakatxnu SaTasxthXlagaLa parxkAra sadAcAriyAgidudx ELigeyanunx hoMduvudakekx sahAyakavAda sucitatx, subudidhx, nirahaMkAra, sumana, sujAcnxna matutx sadABxva eMba Aru vidhada tatatxvXgaLu:}

\begin{entry}

\newmeaning{\artha{Aru akaSxragaLu: SaDakaSxra:} \ullekha{veVdAtiVta, SaDuvaNaRrahita, aSaTxtirxMshatakxLAtiVta, voyxVmAtiVta, kUDalasaMgamadeVva (savasaM. 1; basava. 954-252); EkoVvaNaR SaDuvaNaRveMbene parxBuve, enanx daqSiTx kANadu (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 598-181).}}

\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad parxsAdisathxladalilxruvavana kAraNa tanuvinalilxruva maNipUraka cakarxkekx aginxtatatxvXveV parxdhAna; rUpaveV parxdhAna guNavuLaLx aginxtatatxvXvu icACxshakitxya matotxMdu rUpavAgidudx adakekx rudarxneV adhideVvate; maNipUraka cakarxda madhayxdalilx shivaliMgavide; aginxtatatxvXkekx rUpaveV parxdhAna guNavAdudariMda parxsAdiyu adanunx rudarxnige (aMdare parashivana mUtiRsAdAKayxdalilxruva neVtarx\-veMba bAyige), tananx nirahaMkAraveMba sUkaSxmX hasatxdiMda apiRsi, surUpu eMba parxsAdavanunx paDeyutAtxne; parashiva\-nanunx hiVge pUjisuva sAdhakanu rudarxneMba pUjAri enisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad sUkaSxmX hasatxdiMda mADuva pUje matutx surUpu parxsAdigaLiMdAgi, parxsAdiyu maNipUraka cakarxdalilxruva shivaliMgavanunx dhAyxnisi, alilxruva tAnu paramAtamxneMdu tiLidu, maNi\-pUraka cakarxda utatxra dikikxnalilxruva AnaMdaveMba lakaSxNavanUnx, shariVrasathxveMba saMjecnxyanUnx, kuMDalAkaqtiyanUnx, haritavaNaRvanUnx, BeVrinAdavanUnx anuBavisi AnaMdisutAtxne. idariMdAgi maNipUraka cakarxvanunx sututxvarida icACxshakitxyu shudadhxvAgi muMde adu vidAyxkale enisikoLuLxtatxde. aMtha sAdhakanige sAmaveVda sididhxsutatxde.}}

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad pArxNaliMgi sathxladalilxruvavana anAhatacakarxvanunx vAyutatatxvXvu sututxvaredide. sapxshaRveV parxdhAnaguNavuLaLx vAyutatatxvXvu Adishakitxya matotxMdu rUpavAgidudx adakekx IshavxraneV adhideVvate; I cakarxda madhayxdalilx jaMgamaliMgavide; vAyuvige sapxshaRveV parxdhAna guNavAdudariMda pArxNaliMgiyu adanunx Ishavxranige aMdare, parashivana amUtiRsAdAKayx\-dalilxruva tavxkf eMba bAyige, tananx nimaRlatanuvina sumana eMba sUkaSxmXhasatxdiMda apiRsi, susapxshaRveMba parxsAda\-vanunx BoVgisutAtxne; parashivananunx hiVge pUjisuva sAdhakananunx IshavxrapUjAriyeMdu kareyalAgutatxde.}}

\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad sharaNasathxladalilxruvavana vishudidhxcakarxvanunx AkAsha tatatxvXvu sututxvaredide. shabadxvanunx parxdhAna guNavAgi uLaLx AkAsha tatatxvXvu parAshakitxya matotxMdu rUpu; adakekx sadAshivaneV adhideVvate; I cakarxda madhayxdalilx parxsAdaliMgavide; sharaNanu AkAshada parxdhAna guNavanunx sadAshivanige aMdare, parashivana shivana sAdAKayxdalilxruva shorxVtarxveMba bAyige tananx AnaMda tanuvina \hbox{sujAcnxna} hasatxdiMda, sushabadxveMba padAthaRvanunx apiRsi, adanunx sushabadxveMba parxsAdavanAnxgisikoMDu BoVgisutAtxne. parashivananunx hiVge sUkaSxmX riVtiyalilx pUjisuva sAdhakananunx sadAshivapUjAriyeMdu kareyalAgutatxde.}}

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad oMbatatxne sathxla: nirAtaMka sathxla; niraMjanAkaqti, hakAra \hbox{parxNama}, mahAnAda, pashicxma cakarx, aKaMDajoyxVtivaRNaR, nimuRkitx tanu, nimARya hasatx, niraMjana liMga, pashicxma eMba muKa, aparxmANa Bakitx, aviraLa padAthaR, aviraLa parxsAda, parameVshavxra pUjAri, parameVshavxranadhideVvate; nishacxla sAdAKayx, nivaRMcaka eMba lakaSxNa, aviraLa saMjecnx, nirALa dikukx, agamayx veVda, shivayoVgiyeV aMga, cinamxyAtamx, niravaya shakitx, anaMta kale.}}

\begin{entry}

\newmeaning{\artha{maheVshavxrana aidu mUtiRgaLalilx modalaneyadu. hasuvina hAlu, shaMKadaMtaha biLiya vaNaR; jaTAmakuTagaLiMda alaMkaqta; nAlukx muKa-nAlukx toVLugaLu; hanenxraDu kaNuNxgaLu; eDa hasatxgaLalilx TaMka-shUlAyudhagaLanunx dharisida; balahasatxgaLalilx aBaya-varada muderxgaLanunxLaLx; biLiya vasatxrXvanunx utatxriVyavanAnxgi dharisida; elalx bageya ABaraNagaLiMda alaMkaqtavAda rUpa:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}

\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{shivAginxya ELu nAligegaLu. aginxyu shivana GoVra savxrUpa. aMtaha aginxge suvaNaR, kanakA, rakAtx, kaqSANx, \hbox{suparxBA}, bahurUpA, atirakAtx eMba ELu nAlagegaLu. \hbox{suvaNAR} nAligeya sAthxna pashicxma, kanakA nAligeya sAthxna madhayxdalilx, rakAtx nAligeya sAthxna utatxra, kaqSANxnAligeya sAthxna dakiSxNa, suparxBA sAthxna pUvaR, atirakAtx sAthxna AgenxVya, bahurUpA sAthxna IshAnayx - ivu ELu nAligegaLa sAthxnagaLu. vivAhakAladalilx pashicxma dikikxna (suvaNAR) nAligege, yajacnxkamaRgaLalilx madhayxmasAthxna kanakA nAligege, upanayana kamaR\-dalilx utatxradikikxna rakAtx nAligege, pitaqkamaRgaLalilx dakiSxNa dikikxna kaqSANx nAligege, elalx kAmayx kamaRgaLalilx pUvaR\-dikikxna suparxBA nAligege, shAMtikamaRgaLalilx AgenxVya dikikxna ati\-rakAtx nAligege, ugarxkAyaRgaLalilx IshAna dikikxna bahurUpA nAligege havisasxnunx samapiRsabeVku:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
GoVrAM mama tanuM vahinxM samupAsiVta saMyataH |\\[1pt]
suvaNAR kanakA rakAtx kaqSANx ceYva tu suparxBA ||\\[1pt]
bahurUpA{\char'263}tirakAtx ca sapatxjihAvxH parxkiVtiRtAH |\\[1pt]
suvaNAR vAruNiV jihAvx kanakA madhayxmA samxqqtA ||\\[1pt]
rakAtx ceYvoVtatxrA jihAvx kaqSANx yAmayxdishi sithxtA |\\[1pt]
suparxBA pUvaRdigfjihAvx atirakAtx{\char'263}ginxgoVcarA |\\[1pt]
aishAniV bahurUpA ca jihAvx sAthxnAnayxnukarxmAtf ||\\[1pt]
vivAheV vAruNiV jihAvx madhayxmA yajacnxkamaRsu |\\[1pt]
utatxrA coVpanayaneV dakiSxNA pitaqkamaRsu ||\\[1pt]
pUvaRdikf savaRkAmeyxVSu AgenxVyiV shAMtikamaRsu |\\[1pt]

\ullekha{aMgakAkxcAra \hbox{manakekx} jAcnxna samarasAdevxYtavAda matetx punarapi punadiRVkeSxyuMTe? (savasaM. 5; amurA. 589-186); iSaTxpArxNa samarasAdevxYtavAdude taqpitx (savasaM. 6; Adayayx. 913-276).}}

%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{vacanakArara parxkAra anuBAvada mUlaka paDeda jAcnxna. udAharaNege deVhakikxMta BinanxvAda AtamxvoMdide, A Atamxnu shivAMshikanAgidAdxne, liMgAMga sAmarasayxdalilx nadiyu samudarxdalilx seVri tananx veYyakitxkateyanunx kaLedukoMDaMte, Atamxnu parashivanalilx beretu tananx veYyakitxkateyanunx kaLedukoLuLxtAtxne eMba satayxgaLu parxtayxkaSx athavA anumAnadiMdAgaliV pusatxka athavA gurugaLiMdAgali tiLidukoLaLxlu baruvudilalx.}}

\meaning{\arthanonum{parashiva matutx jiVvara naDuvina saMbaMdha parashiva matutx parxpaMcada naDuvina saMbaMdha. ivugaLa vicAravAgi mAtanADuvAga viVrasheYvAcAyaRru sAgara taraMga nAyxyavanunx baLasikoLuLxtAtxre. jiVvana doVSagaLU, parxpaMcada doVSagaLU parashivanige taTuTxvudilalxve, eMdu yArAdarU AkeSxVpisidare, adakekx viVrasheYvadalilx hiVge utatxrisutAtxre: taqNa matutx kaNagaLu sAgaradalilxve \hbox{eMdare}, sAgarada ALa matutx gAMBiVyaR taqNa matutx kaNagaLalilxve eMdAguvudilalx. taqNa matutx kaNagaLu athavA nore matutx teregaLu sAgarada kaSxNika avasethxgaLeV horatu, adara sArasavxBAvavalalx. adeV riVti, barxhamx, viSuNx muMtAda\-varU, hulumAnavarU parashivanalilxdadxrU avarArU parashivanaMte paripUNaRralalx, nitayxralalx, shudadhxralalx. adeV riVti, noreteregaLu, taqNakaNagaLu sAgaravananxvalaMbisuvaMte \hbox{barxhamx}, viSuNx, modalAda adhideVvategaLU mAnavarU, pArxNigaLU, Bwta vishavxvU parashivananenxV avalaMbisutatxve. avara doVSagaLu, avara anitayxte, parashivanige tAguvudilalx. oMdu veVLe, carAcaravasutxgaLanUnx adhideVvategaLanUnx oLagoMDa iDiV jagatatxnenxV parashivana shariVraveMdu parigaNisidarU, A shariVrada doVSagaLu avanige tAguvudilalx. liMgAMga sAmarasayx paDeda mAnavananenxV deYhika matutx parisarada bAdhegaLu piVDisuvudilalxveMda meVle, nitayxmukatxnAda parashivananunx 35 tatatxvXgaLa shariVravu heVge tAneV piVDisabalalxvu?:}
\ullekha{matatxM, shivane jiVva\-nAdoDe jiVvaMguMTAda jananAdi doVSaMgaLivaMguMTAda pudalAyene sAgarataraMganAyxyadaMtaBeVdaM (savasaM. 11; imamxDi. 1309-602).}}

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad AgamagaLalilxyU, vacanagaLalilxyU baruva I padakekx pArxyashaH I athaRvididxVtu: shivanu citfsavxrUpanAdudariMda avanu iMdirxyAtiVta matutx manoVtiVta. aMtha shivanu Bakatxrige kANisikoLaLxbeVkAdare yAvudAdaroMdu \hbox{mAdhayxma} beVku, athavA, avanu yAvudAdaroMdu rUpa\-dalilx parxkAshisabeVku. iMtha mAdhayxma athavA parxkAshaveV muKa athavA sAdAKayx. athARtf, shakitxgaLanunx cinamxyagoLisuva mUlaka parashivanu parxkAshisutAtxne (vayxkatxvAgu). hiVge shivanu obabxneV AdarU Bakatxrige aidu (athavA Aru) rUpagaLalilx kANisikoLuLxtAtxne. Adare A muKagaLu iMdirxyagoVcaravalalx.}}

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad sAdAKayx parikalapxneyu pArxyashaH parashivana savaRvAyxpakatavxvanUnx savaRjacnxtavxvanUnx parxtibiMbisutatxve. heVgeMdare: kAladeVshagaLa mitigoLapaTaTx mAnavanu yAvudAdaroMdu sathxLa athavA dikikxge hoVgabalalxnu, Adare parashivanu elAlx Aru dikukxgaLigU (meVle, keLage, hiMde, muMde, eDa matutx bala) EkakAlakekx hoVgabalalxnu. athavA vAyxpisabalalxnu. adeV riVti manuSayxnu oMdu kAladalilx oMdeV dikikxnalilx noVDabalalxnu, athavA noVDi ariyabalalxnu. \smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad meVlina I eraDu athaRgaLu keVvala Uheya meVle niMtidudx, avugaLa bagege vacanakAraru Enu heVLutAtxreMbudanunx noVDoVNa. avaru saqSiTxge saMbaMdhisidaMte paMcasAdAKayx kalapxneyanunx hiVge parxtipAdisidAdxre. mUlashakitxyu parashivanalilx yAvAgalU avinABAvadiMda irutatxde. adu parxLayakAladalilx avanalilx avayxkatxvAgi aDagidadxre, saqSiTxya kAladalilx vayxkatxvAgutatxde. \smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{sadoyxVjAta athavA shivasAdAKayx- shAMtayxtiVta kale athavA parAshakitx}}

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad AdhAyxtimxka jiVvanada daqSiTxyiMda noVDidAga, sAdAKayxda parikalapxnege hecicxna athaR barutatxde. Aga `sAdAKayx'kekx bAyi eMbathaRvanunx koDabeVkAgutatxde. (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi. 413-193).} \arthanonum{eMba toVMTada sidadhxliMga shivayoVgigaLa vacanadiMda sapxSaTxvAgutatxde. Aga namamx iMdirxyada parxtiyoMdu bAgilu liMgada parashivana bAyiyAgutatxde. \smallskip

\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad shiva matutx shakitxgaLa saMbaMdha hiVgiruvudariMda parxpaMcada saqSiTxge beVkAguvudu parashivana iceCx mAtarx. avanu iciCxsida kUDale avanalilxyeV avayxkatxvAgi aDagidadx shakitxyu vikAsavAgalu pArxraMBavAgutatxde. shakitxvikAsavu oMdu karxmavananxnusarisutatxde. vacana\-kArara I parikalapxneyanunx sUthxlavAgi hiVge maMDisabahudu. modalu parashivanu tAnobabxneV irutAtxne. EkeMdare Aga parxpaMcaveV inUnx saqSiTxyAgiruvudilalx. parxpaMcavanunx saqSiTxsabeVkeMba iceCx uMTAgutatxde. idanunx niHkala (niSakxla) liMgasathxla eMdu kareyuvudu rUDhi.
